You look up to see a new titaness. A centaur. From her upper body she had dark skin and long blueish black hair and from her lower body she had the legs of a giant zebra. This huge centaurette was even holding onto her head in pain as she came forward. You have to run to the side to avoid being stomped on. "Hey!"

The centaur woman pays you no heed. You're so small she probably doesn't even know there's anyone in her apartment. "Damn it," she muttered. "Did some idiot activate those stupid enchanted hallways again? Last night was hard enough. Sometimes, I hate being a centaur."

Now you get it, she's hungover. Makes sense considering centaurs aren't exactly the tamest creatures. That wasn't good for you. But then again Lupa doesn't know you're in here so you might as well stay here, with this multi mile high zebra woman, until the heat's off. Tough choice.

You then hear a scream and the next thing you know, the centauress has kicked a kettle full of water off the stove and you get splashed. She must've burned herself on the stove trying to heat up a coffee pot. You scream as the water hits you but then you cover your mouth. The centaur girl lets out a groan. "Oh great," she says to herself. "More bad luck right off the back." The centauress then turned and reaches to the ground for the pot she dropped. As you recover from the water attack, you turn your head and then gasp. You realize that the pot fell right near you. Before you can do anything, this ginormous centaur bends down on her front knees and then as she picks up the coffee pot, she looks down in curiosity. "Huh?" You try to run, but it's too late, the centaur has spotted you and you have no idea how she'd react to such a small human trespassing in her home.
1311111.title: Centaur

choices: She asks you why you had a bad morning
She's angry that you made her hangover worse
13111111.content:
"Waitaminute..."In her slurred, recovering speech, her eyes squinted as she brought her head closer to look at you. Of course, you remained perfectly still, more out of fear than survival instincts. As the massive, sky-filling face of the Centaur girl peered ever closer, her eyes a constant lock on you, you began to sweat a little. But what did you have to worry? You were too small even for Lupa to see. This titaness wouldn't even be able to tell you apart from the dust particles. With this in mind, you casually began to stride away back towards the door. Lupa probably had given up by now, and you'd be out of this magic hall and normal-sized in no time.

"Ah-ha!"

Out of nowhere, two massive fingers entrapped you, pinning you between two walls of skin. You were raised incredibly high into the air to stop in front of the massive Centaur Girl's face."I knew it! Dust specks aren't usually skin-toned..."She laughed, only to clutch her head in pain with her free hand. Obviously she was still reeling from whatever debauchery she took part in the former night.

"Please let me go..."You shouted at her, trying to squirm your way out of her pinch.

"Oh. The speck speaks."

"I'm not a speck! I'm human, and my name is R.L.!"

"I heard about you...moved in a little while back."

"I'd love to continue this conversation, but I've kinda had a rough morning. Could you put me back down, and I'll be on my way?"

"Ummm..."She seemed to actually consider the question.

"Nah."
13111111.title: She realizes you're real

choices: Well, I guess you can stay here until the heat's off.
You know, that Lupa might be on to something
131111111.content:
"Listen," says this titanic centaur as she continues holding her head. "I'm tired, half drunk and I feel like I'm going to vomit, I want to know why you ran into my apartment. What was so bad that you had to come here. And please make it slow, my head's still spinning."

You let out a sigh. "Okay, I'll take it nice and easy Ms...." "Zelda. Said the centaur giving you her name. "Zelda. I was out in the hallways for my morning jog, minding my own business when who should show up but Lupa." "Lupa?" asked Zelda. "You mean that werewolf girl down the hall, nice girl." "Not to me!" "Not so loud!" "Sorry. As I was saying, that fleabag chased me in here and as we speak she's trying to find me and if I go out there, she'll find me and then eat me!"

Zelda actually looks confused. "Eat a human?" You nod your head. "Ever since I moved in my life has been in danger. Just wait for her to leave and then I'll be on my way. Never to bother you again." Now Zelda was half drunk but she was thinking the matter over before giving you her response.
131111111.title: She asks you why you had a bad morning

choices: She puts you in a jar for later
1311111112.content:
Zelda takes her sweet time thinking things over and it makes you nervous. She was still a little drunk and that might make her even more dangerous than Lupa if that was even possible. Zelda even tapped one of her back hooves on the ground before looking down at you again and smiling. "You know something little guy? That Lupa might... might very well be on to something." "What do you mean by that?" you asked worried." Zelda then shows you her teeth and smiles again, those teeth remind you of Lupa's and you get a good idea what Zelda wants with you.

"I wonder what you'd taste like." Oh no, this was bad. All you did was change the predator. "B-But centaurs don't eat humans do they? You're part herbivore for crying out loud." "Meh," mutters Zelda as she shrugs her shoulders. "I'm a drunk, I've probably had worse." Zelda then proceeds to grab you by the leg and you scream as she lifts you in the air and holds you over her open mouth. What made it scarier than Lupa was that while Zelda had the legs of a giant zebra, from the waist up she looked human. It made this experience seem somewhat like cannibalism.

You close your eyes and wait for her to get it over with but then Zelda stops herself and rubs her chin. "Wait," she said. "Wait, wait just a minute. This seems too soon. I mean, I've never had a human before." "Then don't start! Humans are poisonous!" You lied, hoping that Zelda would let you go. But as drunk as Zelda is, she sees through this lie. "Pipe down, you don't get a vote. Now, I could eat him right here and now, but I wonder how well he'd go with a swig of moonshine or maybe even aquavit. If I wait until tonight, I'll bet I could make an awesome drink out of him." You let out a groan. Leaving the apartment was a bad idea, but coming here was an even worse one. It's as if the apartment itself was out to get you.
1311111112.title: A New Predator

choices: You escape, but you have to make it across the apartment!
Eight hours pass, and it's time for Zelda's drink, plus one human...
13111111122.content:
Zelda's eyes light up as she finally decided what to do with you. She began walking towards the kitchen with you still firmly trapped between her fingers, each stomp from her hooves a resounding echo. She opened up a cabinet with her free hand and rummaged around, pulling out a small glass jar with a lid that had air holes punched through it. She opened up the top and dropped you inside, sealing the lid tight to make sure you couldn't escape. But how could you? You were so tiny, the inside of the jar was like being in a vast cavern. Zelda settled the giant jar containing you on the table and gave you a little wink.

"Now if you'll excuse me, I have a hangover to sleep off."She yawned before marching off to her bed, collapsing into with a heavy sigh. This roughly gave you around...seven to eight hours to escape. She said she would wait until later tonight to make the drink, but how could you possibly escape? You tried to climb the sides of the jar, but the glass walls were too slick, you simply fell down. Being this small sucked.

"Man...what am I gonna do?"You mutter to yourself. The last thing on your mind was to get eaten today, and yet here you were, in a magic hallway that made monsters thousands of times your size, and trapped in a jar by a drunken centaur.

In a matter of minutes, you could hear Zelda's soft snoring off in the distance. At least you had the comfort of knowing that she was asleep.
13111111122.title: She puts you in a jar for later

choices: Zelda has a roommate who comes in right before you escape!
131111111221.content:
You had no idea how you did, but you figured it took in account of sheer will and determination not to get eaten alive today. Using all the strength you had left, you ascended the inside of the jar, that taking you about two hours to do so as you climb out of one of the air holes in the lid, and it taking you nearly thirty minutes to make your way down the jar again to land on the table, leaving you roughly five hours left to escape before the gigantic centauress awoke and mixed you into one of her alcoholic drinks. But first, you had to take a break. With your heads resting on your knees, you took in big gasps of air, the whole ordeal leaving you quite stressed and exhausted. If you had known that moving into an apartment filled with monsters that would either want to eat you or hurt you, you would have gladly stayed in a human-sized town. But no, you had your reasons for moving to Horrorville, and this was just one of the consequences of that choice. With one last breath, you began making your way across the table, avoiding leftover crumbs the size of giant boulders from previous meals Zelda had had on it, and even a drop or two of vodka the size of a lake. She sure was messy, but you figured as much. This centaur girl seemed the partying type, probably spent her days sleeping away the drunkenness and her nights raving it up at a club that Elle probably DJ'd at.

In another hour, you had made the hazardous trip down one of the legs that held the table up and onto the floor, the wooden terrain stretching out before you as a vast landscape, the only monuments were giant furniture that reached to the sky, the blurry horizon of the door in the distance, and a few of Zelda's bras here and there. What gave you incentive to keep moving was Zelda's thunderous snoring every minute or so, knowing that you had a very limited time to sprint to freedom.

In an hour, you had already made it halfway across the apartment. In another hour, the crack under the door was in sight. What luck! You were so close, you could almost taste freedom. Cadence must've been seriously worried about you being gone all day. But, what could possibly go wrong?
131111111221.title: Across the Apartment

1311111112211.content:
As you make your way across the apartment, the freedom of the door just mere minutes away, the sound of thunder and the ground shaking caused you to stop and turn around in fear. Zelda had gotten out of bed, her massive form looming off in the distance. She couldn't have possibly woken up now! From your perspective and what you could make out of a nearby window, the sun was just setting, giving you plenty of time before the actual 'night' and for the centauress to wake up to an empty jar and a humanless drink. But of course, things just had to go wrong in some way or another.

You stared up at her, expecting her to walk over to the kitchen and roar in anger that you were gone from the jar, but she just stood there, swaying slightly in her stance. It took you a second to realize that she was still asleep! Who knew she was a sleepwalker? Zelda staggered about on her four hooves, running into furniture and bumping against the wall, all the while mumbling something in her sleep. You couldn't help but laugh at such a ridiculous display she was making, until she started nearing towards you. Without warning, one of her landscape-shattering hooves crashed down right beside you, sending you flying for seemingly miles from the sheer force of impact created by her stomp. The zebra-like centaur was still muttering in her sleep, something about more alcohol and a tiny human. Even in her sleep, she was thinking about guzzling you down!

Scrambling back up to your feet, you made a mad dash for the exit, only for her unwitting hooves to follow you all the way with her stomping, threatening you the entire time to squash you flatter than a pancake. One stomp was so powerful, you were sent flying through the air, only to freefall and land in an odd location.
1311111112211.title: Zelda sleepwalks!

choices: Zelda walks right out the door.
13111111122111.content:
You look like you're going to fall and go splat. To keep from falling to your doom, you grab hold of the closest thing you can. You then look to see that you're hanging from an eyelash. It was the size of a tree branch to you at Zelda's size. On second thought, it seemed even bigger. This was the worst possible place for you to land. Zelda may be asleep now, but as far as you can tell and from her mumbling, she still wants to eat you alive by mixing you in with an alcoholic drink. Since you were hanging by an eyebrow, if she woke up, she'd see you and realize you tried to escape.

The universe seems to just plain hate you. No matter what happens you'd be face to face with a predator today. Your escape was so close and now it was ruined by a sleepwalking centaur the size of a continent How could things possibly get any worse.
13111111122111.title: Hanging by an Eyelash

1311111112212.content:
When it looks like you're about to escape after more than five hours, the door opens up and you look up in horror as a new monster comes into the room. She looked shorter than Zelda but because of those magic hallways, she was still several miles high. She had grayish pink skin and long light brown hair that looked like it had horns. She had a dog like face and spikes running down her back. You couldn't tell what kind of monster she was but from the looks of it, she saw the messed up apartment and was pretty mad.

"Zelda," she muttered in a gruff yet high pitched voice. "Unbelievable. I visit my brother for the weekend and come back to a disaster area. Blasted drunk!" You have to run to the side as this monster woman kicked an empty beer bottle away. "I can't believe there were no open apartments when I moved in. Of all the creatures I get stuck with, I have a centaur for a roommate. I could've moved in with Aqua or Patsy or maybe even that stoner Alicia, but no, I had to get stuck with a centaur who couldn't keep a tidy apartment to save her life. If she drank my goat's blood again I'm going to kick her zebra striped ass."

Goat's blood? This woman was a chupacabra! Oh no, this was bad. You almost escaped being swallowed with an alcoholic drink by a giant centaur but now that giant chupacabra woman might try to do something similar and she's bending over right now to pick up the trash on the ground. Does she spot you as she picks up one of Zelda's bras?
1311111112212.title: The Goat Sucker

choices: Catalina says she wants to eat you now
13111111122121.content:
Slowly, the chupacabra woman's eyes scoured the floor, falling upon your mite-sized self hiding by one of Zelda's massive bras. You ducked underneath one of the cups of the undergarment, your sky being replaced by the fabric of the bra. Suddenly, the area around you began to shake dramatically as Zelda's roommate lifted up the bra, taking you with it. You stumbled into the deep imprint of the cup, the monster's eye falling upon you.

"A human?!"She gasped out loudly, causing you to hold your hands over your ears due to the magnitude of her voice.

She stormed over to Zelda, violently shaking her awake."Huh?"

The centauress stumbled out of bed to look goofily at the chupacabra, smiling widely."Hey Catalina! How was your trip?"

The now named chupacabra woman, Catalina, simply shoved Zelda's own discarded underwear into her face."Can you explain why there's a tiny human in your bra?"

Zelda blinked twice before recognition came over her face."Oh, yeah! I was gonna...eat him."She chuckled slightly before reaching towards you with her massive digits, holding you helplessly between her fingers."But I was totally half-drunk when I was going to do that. Sorry about that little guy, no hard feelings?"She gives you a sorry smile.
13111111122121.title: Catalina the Chupacabra

choices: She succeeds and knocks Catalina out
She misses and Catalina locks her outside
131111111221212.content:
Before you can say a word to Zelda, Catalina snatches you out of her roommate's hand and then gives you a sinister look as she shows you her fangs. "Come to think about it, I haven't had a human in six years." Zelda's eyes pop in horror as Catalina licks she front teeth with her long gaping tongue. You let out a sigh. "At this point I shouldn't be surprised."

Catalina starts to take you into the kitchen but then Zelda gets up and gallops behind her roommate. "Come on Catalina, give the little guy a break. He was chased in here by that werewolf Lupa and then I trapped him in a jar all day. The poor guy's tired and probably starving to death." Catalina just turns her head and gives Zelda a look. "If he's dumb enough to go jogging out in the open on a floor where he knows there's a wolf waiting to eat him and then tries to hide in an apartment of a monster he doesn't even know, he deserves to be eaten."

Well, Catalina had you there. You let out a groan. Catalina decides to walk over to the kitchen. "Now," she said. "Should I make you into goat blood salsa or merely wrap you up in a burrito." You didn't respond. You wasted all your energy trying to escape and now you were going to be eaten by a chupacabra woman.

The only plus was that Zelda came to her senses and was angrily looking at her roommate who turned her back to her. "Catalina!" she yells. Zelda rushes at Catalina in an attempt to tackle her.
131111111221212.title: Big Surprise (Sarcastic)

1311111112212122.content:
Zelda tries to tackle her bloodthirsty roommate but then she trips on a wine bottle and tumbles to the door as Catalina opens it wide. Catalina then locks the door as Zelda crashes. Zelda gets back up and walks to the door again and tries to open it, but then let out a groan. "Not again." She mumbles. You weren't surprised. Zelda sounds like the kind of monster who relies on Catalina to let her in when she's locked out, but this time Catalina wasn't letting her back in.

"Don't worry Zelda. I'll let you back in after I eat the human. If I have uno centavo for every time I've had to let her in at the middle of the night. Zelda loses a lot of keys. The only reason we're roommates is because that centaur is incapable of living on her own. But no point in delaying the inevitable." Catalina looks down on you and licks her fangs again. "Why is it all canine monsters in this apartment want to eat me?" Catalina walks up and places you in the jar again but unlike Zelda, she pours in olive oil to make it too slippery for you to climb out. "Unlike Zelda, I don't make mistakes." You let out a sigh. This time you were finished. The only thing you could do was be eaten.

Catalina at this point is digging through the refridgerator for ingredients as you look at her body. She was very hot looking for a chupacabra and besides the spikes on her back and her dog face, she was a total bombshell. "Now human," she says. "How should I be devouring you."

You let out a sigh. "At least I get to choose how I'm eaten."
1311111112212122.title: Out of Luck

choices: There's a Knock on her Door
131111111222.content:
You desperately try climbing the jar but it's much too slippery and you let out a grunt as you keep on trying. "Why did I have to leave the apartment? you ask to yourself. "Why did I... Ah!?" You let out a grunt and bang your head on the glass walls. Of all the cluster storms this was the worst. First you get chased by Lupa into a hall that makes monsters several miles high and now a giant drunken centaur girl was going to make you into an alcohol drink. You didn't get it, horses didn't eat people, people didn't eat people (most of the time), so why would a centaur even think about eating you, even if she was blind drunk.

You try climbing for two more hours before passing out from exhaustion. You're woken up eight hours later by the sound of Zelda's four hooves clopping forward. You wake up and look out the window to see that night has fallen. "Crap!" you yell. You see Zelda walking forward and even having slept off that hangover she had earlier, she still had a dizzy smile on her face as she swung her backside and tail.

She was carrying several bottles of alcohol in one hand and a small glass cup in the other. She places the cup and bottles on the table as she brings her head to your level and taps on the jar you're in, creating sound waves that nearly deafen you. Zelda then shows her huge teeth, the size of buildings due to this enchanted hallway and you tremble. "I've never had a human in my life," says the titanic zebra centaur "Let's see how you taste with a little experiment of mine."

You watch as Zelda picks up a bottle of tequila and another bottle of vanilla soda and then pours both of them inot her glass. Then she adds a drop of cough syrup to your surprise. Then Zelda reaches for a bottle of tobasco sauce and blows on her finger at you. "If Catalina found out I was using her tobasco she'd make glue out of my feet." Zelda then hums to herself as she adds the sauce and then a few lemon drops, making that vile alcoholic concoction fizz and smoke. She stirs with a large spoon and that only increases the intensity of the smoke. Finally, Zelda lights a match and causes flames to appear at the top of the drink as you watch in horror. "She's gonna drink me with that?!

Zelda blows out the flames and gives a smile as she reaches for the jar you're in. She opens the jar and then shakes it as you scream and fall plummeting into the alcoholic brew. You submerge and then surface and cough on the foul taste of the junk as your eyes spin around. Thankfully you didn't swallow it. There was enough booze in this glass to kill you, not counting the other stuff Zelda put in. Of course that's assuming being swallowed by a drunk centaur didn't kill you first.

Zelda gives a smile as she sniffs the drink. "Now let's see how much flavor a little human adds to it." This was so not good, you were going to be eaten, or more accurately drunk by a colossal centaur. Even Lupa would be better for you at this point.
131111111222.title: Micro Brew

choices: She places you on the ground and tries to stomp you with her hoof
131111112.content:
She scrunched up her face, rubbing her temples furiously to alleviate the headache coursing through her pained features. Obviously your presence had made everything worse for this massive centaur."Man..."She said, a hint of agony underneath her words."You're given' me the worst headache right about now..."

"Sorry."You weren't. This entire situation shouldn't even had happened. Just your terrible luck, you supposed.

Her angry eyes roved over your tiny form."Man, you humans are really annoying, ya know that?"

"...?"

"Bargin' into a centaur's room when she's trying to work off a hangover..."

From the smell of her breath, you figured she was barely hungover. This gal obviously was still a tad drunk.

"You've really pissed me off, y'know that?"

These words were the worst thing to come out of a gigantic, multi-mile high monster. You just hoped she would leave it at that, put you back down, and let you be on your merry way. You highly doubted it however. Terrible luck, remember?

"I think you need to be punished, speck."

"It's R.L...."

"And I'm Zelda. But you don't see me spouting my name everywhere, do ya?"She said angrily, tumbling over her words in a hazy slur. Wow, she really was still drunk. Maybe if the circumstances had been different, you could've met her on better terms. She could've been an entirely different monster sober. Unfortunately, you got a drunken angry Zelda instead."Little..annoying..."She grumbled, still clutching her head with her free hand.

"Now, I know you're angry...and a bit drunk right now,"You tried to reason with the massive centaur."But this is all a big mistake..."

"You bet it is."She interrupted you with her much more thunderous voice.
131111112.title: She's angry that you made her hangover worse

choices: She stomps down with much more successful results this time
You escape, and you're out the door!
1311111121.content:
In a flash, you found yourself back on the floor, the terrain of wood expansively stretching out before you, but what took your attention was rapt awe for the gargantuan Centaur that towered miles above, her large size causing her upper torso to disappear into a fine blur. Firstly, you had thought that she had released you, despite her angry rant. Maybe she was thinking a bit clearly through her headached and drunken haze? But of course, that cheery and bright idea left your head far too quickly. The sky overhead became dark and sinister as the visage of Zelda became blocked out by her all-encompassing hoof. She was planning to squash you! Without a second thought, you began to run. You were much lighter and quicker due to your new diminutive stature, but you hoped with all of your might that that would outmatch the centaur woman's sheer size. As you dashed away at full speed, you looked up, her mighty hoof descending at an extremely casual place, as if crushing you was an everyday thing and nothing to make a fuss over. What added to the danger was that you also had to avoid chunks of dirt, giant boulders to you, that fell from her hoof, probably accumulated over time. Were all monsters this careless towards humans, Cadence excluded?!

Suddenly, light shifted overhead. You had escaped from underneath Zelda! And just in time to, because right behind you, her mountainous hoof, large enough to devastate a small town, crashed into the ground, creating cataclysmic quakes that blew you away and shook the earth. She even added a little twist to make sure you were dead, as if she were squishing a bug."Did I get 'em?"She asked herself, only to look down with a displeased look, seeing your speck of a form still running away.

"You're really annoying, y'know that?"She thundered from high above, raising her hoof again to step on you, leading to the previous scenario all over again, except this time, you were much more tired. You didn't know if you had enough energy to outrun the titanic centaur this time.
1311111121.title: Stomping Grounds

13111111211.content:
You. You try to run but it's no use, Zelda quickly brings her hoof on you with enough force to destroy a city, rendering you as nothing more than a tiny red spot on her sole. Zelda gives a satisfied smirk before she twists her hoof to make sure you were dead. "Well lookie there," she said still tipsy. "I got 'em. annoying pests, I have half a mind to move to a classier apartment." With that, Zelda lets out a yawn and goes to sleep her hangover off. When she awakes she will forget about crushing you beneath her hoof.

As for Cadence, she woke up later that morning and saw you gone and went looking for you. She asked everyone you both knew and then went around the new hallway. She asked several creatures including a chimera, a manticore and even a Frankenstein if they had seen you but she didn't get any answers. Cadence even asked Zelda but Zelda, the drunk that she was had no recollection of squishing you. "Human? Can't say I've seen him. I hope you find him soon. You know there are tons of predators in this apartment.

Eventually Cadence's search proves fruitless and she can only assume that Lupa ate you and confronts Lupa and gives her a few angry grunts. "Get off my case Cadence. I told you before. I didn't eat him." But Cadence didn't believe Lupa and would never speak to her again. Nobody would ever know that Lupa was innocent and that it was a drunken centaur that ended your life.
13111111211.title: Smashed

choices: Yes. Hopefully she hasn't detected you.
13111111212.content: As Zelda brought her moon sized hoof down, you used the last of your energy to dart out and under the door. You look back to see her twisting her hoof into the ground. A sinister smile appears on her face as she believes she snuffed you out. "Good," she said. "Got him. Blasted humans. Nothing but vermin." With that she walked away still holding her head as you see her tail wagging. That was too close for comfort. If you were any slower, you'd be dead. You were about to walk away, when you realized something. The reason you ran into Zelda's apartment in the first place was to get away from Lupa. Oh man, if you go back out there, you'll be back to square one. You certainly can't go back in Zelda's apartment, not with an angry drunk centaur who could squash you flat. But you are hesitant to go out there and face the possibility Lupa would finally catch you. You have no other choice and have to walk out into the hall. Is Lupa still out there?
13111111212.title: The Great Escape (Maybe)

131111112121.content: "Crap!" you yell before you cover you mouth. Lupa was right in front of you, or more accurately her behind was right in front of you as she continued to sniff the ground. By the movements of her tail she was getting really mad trying to find you. Hopefully she hasn't picked up your scent and you know she's too big to see you so you think you're safe. But then you heard quakes. She's turning around and she's going to be facing you in a few seconds. What are you going to do now? You can't go back into Zelda's apartment. Maybe if you stayed perfectly still she wouldn't see you and give up, but that's risky. Zelda was able to see you by focusing hard enough and she was drunk! Maybe you can try your luck with one of Zelda's neighbors?
131111112121.title: Here We Go Again

1311111121211.content: Lupa continues to turn around while trying to sniff out your presence. You dare not move an inch of your body in fear of the titaness before. She continues to turn and is now facing your direction. You look directly towards her eyes, but she had them closed. She was relying solely on her nose to find you, which was good luck for you because she may have seen you with open eyes. She sniffed a bit in your direction, but kept turning away from you, flicking her tail angrily. You let out a breath of relief and look back to Lupa. She had stopped spinning and her tail was still, then she started to turn back towards you! You hold your breath as she faces towards you once more, and you even begin to break out in a cold sweat. She sniffed at you a few times, and began to move forward. She inched towards you farely slowly for a being so gigantic. Every step sent shivers down your spine, because each one was a step closer to your death. Her nose stopped just before it touched you and took a long smell, which knocked you off balance and was strong enough to pull you towards her. You grabbed on to the edge of her nose to prevent yourself from going any further. If you were to let go now, you would surely end up on a one-way trip to her large belly. And that's when...
1311111121211.title: Stand perfectly Still.

choices: You head back to your apartment, safe and sound
A Monster from this new hall finds you
131111112122.content: To your sweet relief, the massive werewolf woman was gone. No sight of her, she had obviously grown bored of sniffing the ground, hoping to find your speck-sized form. Hopefully, everything would be smooth sailing as you returned home.
131111112122.title: Out in the Hall

1311111121222.content:
You think that with Lupa gone, you believe you can go home without any problem, you definitely don't want to run into any more monsters. If they're anything like Zelda, you doubt you'd survive. You hear loud stomping, it sounded loud even for a monster made thousands of feet tall by the enchanted hallway. It also sounded slow and you hear a clanking noise. Then you look up to see that you're in some sort of laboratory with strange machines and vials of potions all around. You then look up to see a new titaness who looked really bizarre. She had grayish green skin, patchwork in appearance and was wearing a schoolgirl's outfit. However several parts of her body looked mechanical with several steel patches. She had bolts in her neck, a pair of conductor coils on her back and robotic hands with four fingers each that almost looked like claws. One of her eyes even looked mechanical and one of her feet looked like it was completely made of metal.

You were looking up at a genuine Frankenstein. As she walks out, the phone rings loudly and she lets out a grunt. "Not again," she says as she looks at the caller ID. "Dad. Does he have to call the first thing in the morning." As the Frankenstein woman picks up the phone, you look in amazement, this was the first time you've ever seen an artificial monster. She looked as though she'd be taller than most of the monsters in the apartment (with the obvious exceptions of Chel and Petra of course) even without the magic hallways.

You decide to listen in on her conversation. "Hi Dad, it's me Widget. I'm fine Dad. I just woke up. You ask that same question every morning. How many times do I have to tell you I'm not a little girl you built in your lab anymore. In fact, I never was a little girl considering you built me to be the size of a skyscraper. I don't even want to know where you got the materials. I know you worry about me, but it's not necessary. I'm 18 months old, I can take care of myself." You let out a laugh. Even if she was a giant monster, Widget was acting like a teenager who had moved out of her parents' house. "Aw Dad, come on, I told you, there aren't any guys in this building. It's perfectly safe. Although that mummy who runs this place is a jerk most of the time." You let out another laugh. Widget didn't like Nefernina any more than you did.

Suddenly Widget's mechanical eye fell out and landed with a boom as you let out a scream. "Crap!" yells Widget. "Oh, it's nothing Dad. My eye fell out, again. Don't worry, it's indestructible, remember? Just how you made me." Widget lets out a grunt and then reaches down for her eye as it rolls towards you and you step back. Does the eye see you?

Then you saw a sticker on the wall that read "Stunt Girl". You're starting to realize something. There was a jiang-shi in this apartment that worked as a stunt girl for action movies and from the looks of it she was jealous of the woman she filled in for. You let out a laugh. Monsters had egos too, you knew it from living next door to Mavis.

But then you hear footsteps. "Get out of the way wolf girl, what are you doing out here anyway? Have you no pride going to all this trouble to catch one tiny human." "Like you're one to talk about pride Koko," said Lupa's voice in the hall. "You say you're gonna get your face on a poster but you just play second banana." "Laugh now Lupa. But I'll show you."

You let out a gasp because the door is unlocking. You don't know what this monster thinks about humans. What do you do?
13111122222221.title: Koko the Hopping Corpse

choices: Koko cages you and makes you her pet.
131111222222212.content:
Before you could even think about finding a place to hide, Koko, as you heard Lupa call her, bunny-hopped into her apartment, grumbeling about "hairy blobs of flea-bait" to herself. You almost laugh, already liking how she saw Lupa.

As you got a good look as Koko after she turned on the light, you had to confess that the Jiang Shi was actually...you couldn't believe you were saying this about a monster...cute, at least once you got past the green skin, sharp black fingernails, and the stiff jumping.

Her face was heart-shaped, a button nose, and she had blood-red, amond-shaped eyes and when she opened her mouth to yawn, it was possible to see that her canines were slightly longer than her other teeth and were pointed into fangs. Her outfit consisted of white socks, black slippers, loose black trousers with dark velvet green cuffs, a long-sleeved black tunic with dark velvet green cuffs and a black, high-collared sleeveless overtunic with dark velvet green trim. A wide dark green sash/belt kept the overtunic in place. Koko also wore a green and black Mandarin-styled hat topped with a green ball and trim.

You sigh to yourself, Great...you think, you can't afford to fall for any of these horror-giantesses. As the breath leaves your bodym you recall how Jiang shi can locate their victims by their breath...but that means...HO SHIT!

"Huh?!" Koko said and looked down, spotting you "Well, well...so THIS is what that werewolf was outside my door for!"

You look up and see Koko leaning down as far as her unbending legs would allow, using the tips of her hands to put her in a position that seems like she's going to do a push-up.

"Uh...hi," you said, it was all you could think of to say, looking into the angry eyes of the giantess jiang-shi.

"What are you doing here, human?!" Koko demanded.

"Trying to avoide that werewolf that wants to eat me alive." you answer honestly. "I...uh...ran in here at randome trying to avoid Lupa. Sorry."

Koko gives a frustrated sigh, and you nearly get knocked off your feet by it as Koko mutters to herself about dumb animals and lots of silver as she pushed herself upright.

"So you're an actress?" you ask, looking around the apartment.

She frowns at that and glares at the posters on the wall "I should be, but I...urgah!" she groaned in frustration.

"Tell me about it, I have a hard time getting a job myself...all my employers want to eat me alive." you said. "Anything I could do to help you?" you ask her.

Koko lets out a bittersweet chuckle at that "Unless you're an agent or derector, then no, still...you are sweet to offer."

"Sorry." you said. "Still...what could I do even if I wasn't?"

Koko looks thoughtful for a few moments and you wonder what she's thinking, before she smiles as she looks down at you.

"Well, I do feel rather lonely here by myself...you know, I think there's something you CAN do fir me after all..." she said.
131111222222212.title: Meeting Koko

choices: Koko gets to the birthday party and then you are sold to the giantess
1311112222222121.content:
"Well... I was always wanting a human pet, and since you look so cute.... you are going to be my pet as of today." Koko said as she picks you up and locks you in a human prison cell as your cage. You are shocked and horrifed that you are going to have to face a life you really hated to be in. Being a pet, or even a slave to a monster... and it's the most horrendous experience that can ever happen to a human in the city.

She has locked you up for the night and you were feed respectively... and then she comes to the prison and opens your door, and then picks you up and places you on a collar. "Say... what does this thing do?" you asked.

"Try cussing at me!" Koko said. "Fuc***" you try to say, then suddenly you receieve an shock to your body and you collapse to the ground. She then picks up your shocked body and then places you in a box that looks like a birthday present. "In reality, you are actually going to be a slave to a 10 year old human giantess... I promise I get her a birthday present, and I trick you good. So long with your new master!" Koko said before she closes the door on you, leaving you in complete darkness as Koko now takes the present to the human giantess's birthday party.
1311112222222121.title: A Deal

choices: The scene goes off perfectly and a delighted Koko takes you home with her.
After the filming, you run into Vivian Wong and she's PISSED with you!
13111122222221211.content:
You couldn't believe this! You were a birthday present! For a HUMAN giantess...you didn't even know there WERE human giantess in this town!

As Koko stopped moving you heard shouting outside of the box you were in:

"Places everyone! Gotta try and get this in one take, all right?!"

A movie set? Koko took you to a movie set? What the...you thought she was taking you to a birthday party! Koko looks down at you aplogetically.

"Let me guess...you offered me as a part of the cast or something to get the lead part?" you say flatly. Well, you DID tell her "Anything I could do to help you?" before...looks like you're living up to offering her your help after all.

She nodded. "Yeah...sorry and for not telling you, but if you thought it was real it would be more convencing..." she said, looking sheepish as she took you out of the box and set you on her shoulder.

As you look around, you spot another Jiang Shi scowling at you, this one had blue skin and she didn't look too pleased. You guessed this was the other Jiang Shi whose pictures Koko had colored in to try fooling herself into having the parts of. You gulp as she gives you a look of utter loathing that even Nefernina couldn't muster.

"Uh...Koko....?" you squeak, worried.

She looked where you were and scowled at the fellow Jian Shi. "Leave him alone, Vivian Wong." she said.

"Damned stunt-double had to bribe her way into a leading role since she's got no talent." Vivian muttered, still trying to glare you to death. Sheesh! Did that chick have a dieva complex or What?!

"Uh...Koko...do me a favor: I wanna live..." you mutter and she nodded. "Relax, Cutie...you're my pet after all, and you're helping me get my big break, so letting you die isn't gonna happen as long as I'm around." she cooed to you then hopped over to the director, a dream-eating baku.

"Ah Koko, perfect timing. And I take it this is the human you mentioned yesterday?" he said looking at you.

Koko nodded "Yes sir, he's wondering about his part."

He nodded and turned to you "All right then human, in that case I'll tell you straght, your role is easy: you are going to be a slave to a 10 year old human giantess, but no one knows you're a Dàoshì who can summon corpses, and in order to get away, you summon a giant Jiang Shi, that is, Koko here, but she goes out of control and as she rampages, you're apparently crushed to death. After that, koko takes the center stage. One more thing...no swearing in my movies, since kids like action flicks. Got it?" he said.

You nodded, though you did feel a bit uneasy about the "apparently crushed to death" part.

Koko goes to put you back in the box she carried you in and once it was shut, you heard the director shout "Annnd...ACTION!"
13111122222221211.title: Lights. Camera. and....

choices: Bring you back to her to kill herself
131111222222212112.content:
Not long after filming is complete and the baku director yells "It's a wrap!" You felt a little dizzy but you let out a sigh because it was over. They made it look like Koko had crushed you but Koko was rubbing you by the head as she smiled down on you. "Thank you so much R.L., I owe you one. That film might just make my career. You were great." "Thanks," you say. "You weren't too bad yourself. I'm surprised up until now you were a stuntgirl."

"Thanks. Maybe that will shut those neighbors up about my career." You smile because not only did you get away from Lupa, but you did a good thing for a friendly new neighbor. Of course, you would have to explain everything to Cadence later about being reduced to a pet for another monster but you figure it might not be so bad.

But unfortunately something had to go horribly wrong, that diva Vivian Wong came forward and she was pissed as she glared at you and Koko. "You got lucky," she said. "For a beginner. It won't happen again. I am not about to lose the spotlight to this green hack and her pet human." Of course, you had a few words to say to her. "I've heard just enough from you Viv." "What was that?" "You heard me, you're nothing more than a territorial prima donna who's always taking credit for everything Koko does. For a jiang-shi, you're not very good at fighting. I'll bet that you'd even lose a fight to a ghost. You can't act, you can't fight, all you can do is look good and you can't even do that right. As far as I'm concerned you are a disgusting $*)#@% beast bitch." Vivian was fuming mad and even pulled on her hair before moving the card over her face to show you her angry red eyes. Vivian hisses at you, but you just nod your head and mutter hmph because you didn't regret what you said and with that you and Koko were walking off.

"I didn't think anyone would stand up to Vivian like that. You've got guts for such a little guy." You let out a laugh. "Up until now I thought that Nefernina was the meanest monster in Horrorville but that blue chick proved me wrong. Oh she did. But people like her fade away. You've got a heart and that helps your career big time." Koko then brings you up to her face to kiss you.

Little did you know that Vivian knew somebody in your apartment, in the same neighborhood as Koko. This was Layla, a dullahan, a type of monster whose head wasn't attached to her body. Koko told you that one of her other neighbors, Bianca, believed that Layla was a professional killer but Koko assured you that it wasn't true. Unfortunately, Koko had no idea just how wrong she really was and Vivian was on the phone with Layla right now.

"I hope you're not hiring me to go after that other jiang shi Viv," says Layla's head as her body sharpens a knife. "That's not possible. I don't do the undead. If I could kill the undead, you think that Nefernina would still be breathing down my neck... if I had one?" "No," says Vivian. "I'm after that human she used to buy her way to the top. We'll teach her a lesson by getting her precious pet human out of the way. Be careful though. As much as I hate to admit it Koko knows some martial arts. But still, get the human"

What does Vivian want that assassin to do?
131111222222212112.title: Wrath of Vivian

choices: Koko keeps foiling any attempts to ham you and Layla eventually gives up
Layla snags you and mails you to Vivian's  mansion for her to torture
1311112222222121122.content:
"Ok...so whatddya want?" Layla said.

Vivian scowled "I wanna teach that pest a lesson personally. Just get him to me!" she growled.

Layla's head rolled her eyes "Ok...but next time you personally want to kill someone, leave me out of it. If you plan on doing the killing yourself, there's no need for an assassin. So...back to business: know the name of the target?"

"Called himself R.L." Vivian said.

"R.L...?" Layla said then she broke out into a laughing fit "Are you serious! HIM! Ho man...this'll be easy! I live in the same apartment complex as the guy!"

Vivian's eyes widened "What?!"

Her laugh dying down to a chuckle, Layla explained, "Yeah...Nefernina can't stand him and there's this one bloated werewolf bitch that's always trying to eat him. Gotta say, I actually find it amusing."

"Just get him to me so I can make him suffer!" Vivian snapped.

"Gotcha...though I expect triple my usual rate for this: like I said, if you plan on doing the killing yourself, there's no need for an assassin. And you know I don't like my time wasted." Layla said.

"Fine."

With that, the pair hung up on one another and Layla smirks. In all honesty, she had seen R. L. around and had to confess that the appartment would be boring without the human. Still, she wasn't one to turn down a job...even if she didn't like it.

"Ah well...sorry R. L., but I AM gonna miss how lively you make this place." Layla said to herself as she had her body hold her head under one arm like a basketball and moved to the lobby of the appartmen.

---

You and Koko arrive back at the appartment, still chatting about this and that, and you had to confess that she was good company....even if she was your, you hated the term, new owner. You suddenly freeze up as survival instinct suddenly blares that there's someone around that's after you. You had long since learned to trust this feeling since you had moved here. Between Nefernina and Lupa, you couldn't afford NOT to.

"Hmm...Something wrong R. L.?" Koko asked, seeing her pet tenst up all over.

"Uh...nothing, just the vibes I get thanks to Lupa." you say and Koko frowns.

"That's supposed to be "nothing"? I don't think so...if anyone tries to take you away, there'll be hell to pay...intrest included!"

You sigh and relax, giving the green-skinned jiang-shi a greatful smile, missing the headless dullahan's eyes following you as Koko hopped through the lobby.
1311112222222121122.title: The hit's target

13111122222221211221.content:
"Time to strike." Says Layla. Layla dives out and you turn around to see the giant dullahan coming right at you before you let out a scream that alerts Koko into kung fu kicking Layla and making her drop her head and grunting in pain. "Hey dummy!" she yells. "Keep a better grip! Oh, right, I'm the part with all the brains." "Layla?" asks Koko. "What are you doing. Layla picks up her head and you see that had it not been the magic hallway you're in making monsters titanic, her head alone would only be 50 feet tall but the hallway made it much bigger than her body was when it began and having a city sized severed head in front of you left you scared enough to run up your owner's sleeve.

"I'm gonna make this as easy as possible," says Layla. "Hand me the human. I have a client who wants to deal with him. You let out a gasp. She was an assassin and right under the same roof on the same floor as your original apartment when you lived with Cadence and in the same hallway as your new home. This couldn't be possible. Why hadn't Petra or even Nefernina found out about this? Koko just places you under her hat as she holds out both of her arms. "You're not getting R.L. without a fight.

Layla tries to punch Koko but Koko ducks and then grabs her by the arm before tossing her over her shoulder. "Ah!" Then Koko picks Layla's head up. "Let me go corpse face!" "Like you're one to talk?" asks Koko. Layla's body tries to get her head back, but Koko punches her in the chest and forces the body on her knees. You're in awe. You saw those moves in action during the shooting but you didn't think you'd see them for real combat and against a dullahan as well. Layla's head grit her teeth and her body got up before inching towards Koko but Koko gave a sly smile. "Here catch!"

Koko looked like she was going to throw Layla's head and Layla's body went to try and catch it but Koko pulled back her arm and dropped Layla's head on the ground. "Ouch!" It was at this point Layla's body picked up a knife and you screamed. But before Layla's body could do anything else one of the doors opened up and hit the body to knock it down. It was a Kitsune woman that walked out completely obviously to the assassin she had just clobbered. Layla's body wound up in turn tripping and falling down a flight of stairs before landing with a crash. Layla let out an annoyed grunt. "I'm sending you my hospital bill Janine!"

Then Koko picks Layla up by the nostrils as the head lets out a groan. "Time to teach you a lesson for trying to hurt my friend." Koko takes Layla to the laundry room and puts her head in the washing machine. "Isn't this a little extreme Koko?" you ask. "R.L.," says Koko. "Layla kills people for a living. She's not getting any less than she deserves." "You wouldn't dare turn that thing on." But Koko gives a vicious smile and turns on the washing machine as Layla lets out a scream and goes through a very violent spin cycle. You know how that felt. One time Bernice accidentally knocked you in with her laundry and you caught a cold because of it. But now Layla was getting it and from the expressions you could see from her bodiless head, she wasn't enjoying it.

By the time Koko lets Layla out, Layla is coughing and even spits up bubbles. "Have you had enough." "I give, I give." "Maybe we should tell Petra there's a killer under this roof. "No don't! I once assassinated an ambassador! If Petra gets her claws on me, I'll go to jail for life and since I'm undead, that's a really, really long time." "Then leave R.L. alone. Capiche?" Layla lets out a groan. "Capiche." Koko then places Layla's head on top of a washing machine before she walks away. "You could at least take me to the part of me that's in traction."

You let out a sigh of relief. You're really glad that you're not going to be killed by a jiang-shi giantess anytime soon. "Thanks Koko," you say. "Maybe being your... ugh... your pet won't be so bad." Koko simply smiles and strokes your head.

What happens now.
13111122222221211221.title: Assassin Outclassin

choices: The Dark Side inmates snatch you--follow you
The Dark Side inmates snatch you--follow Koko
131111222222212112211.content:
Vivian Wong scowled at the news that Layla failed, then turned to the people she had smuggled out of Under Gloom, the most awful prison known to monster kind. Located 10,000 miles on a mountaintop above the city of Fearfield, this prison is nearly impossible to escape from. It hadn't been easy, she'd bankrupt herself getting them out and paying them to do this job. They were all from Dark Side.

The Dark Side is where monsters who committed crimes so heinous, they were locked up for life were kept in Under Gloom. No human that had crossed into the Dark Side has ever come out alive.

Which was why these five were absolutely perfect to get rid of that upstart Koko and her pet human. Besides...it wasn't like she couldn't get the money back by doing a few starring roles.

She looked at them, all of them the worst of the worst.

Mariah, a giant centaur with the lower body of a quagga (an extinct relative of the zebra). She was imprisoned for rape.

Ursula, a titanic grizzly werebear with a hatred against fairies and similar monsters. Ursula led an anti-fairy riot against the governor that failed. Shes easily recognizable by her missing left eye.

Persephone, alias, the white werewolf. A curvaceous albino werewolf girl imprisoned for cannibalizing other monsters. Shes locked up in her cell 24/7 because otherwise shed attack the other inmates and has even gone after the guards. Persephone considers herself a gourmet among cannibals and was known for cooking her victims. However, she wont pass off a yummy human. Because of her vicious appetite, Under Gloom's warden, Destiny, put a muzzle on her.

Arethusa, alias, the doomsday dragon. A European dragoness with orange brown scales, ram like horns and long blonde hair. Arethusa was imprisoned for manufacturing deadly bombs that were used for murder. She was very reclusive and will breathe fire on anyone dumb enough to come close to her cell, even the guards.

Yuri, a titanic obese gorgon with blue pythons for hair. Yuri is the most dangerous monster in the entire prison. A deranged serial killer who abused her gorgon eyes to kill over one hundred monsters so she could mutilate their stone corpses for her own twisted amusement. Upon her imprisonment Yuri was fitted with a visor to negate her petrifying gaze. As sadistic as she is towards monsters, Yuri has been known to grab any human unfortunate enough to get close to her cell with her snake hair to either eat or torture.

Sakuya, a black spider drider resembling a pale skinned child despite being an adult. Sakuya committed every crime known to monster and human alike, but instead of giving her the death penalty, she was attached to a machine that puts her in an endless coma so she'd live out the rest of her natural life dreaming. However, the device can attach to humans to put them in her dreamworld and dying in the dream means dying in reality.

"So...you all know what to do. Find and erase that human and the green-skinned upstart...by any means you deem necessary." Vivian said coldly.

The criminals all grinned bloodthirstily at that.

======

Koko smiled at you as she took you to a Chinese Culture Festival. It was just a small little thing, but you had to say you were actually enjoying it. Besides, it helped you learn about your new friend a bit.

That was always welcome.

As you and Koko sat down to eat a meal of moo goo gai pan mixed with braised conpoy scallops and broccoli with pineapple fried rice and sweet and sour orange kung pao chicken, however, a loud series of terrified screams reached the two of you and utter pandemonium broke out.

And at the center of it all, enjoying and clearly basking in the utter chaos their mere presence caused, were a giant centaur with the lower body of a quagga, a titanic grizzly werebear that was missing left eye, a white werewolf with a muzzle on her, an European dragoness with orange brown scales, ram like horns and long blonde hair, a titanic obese gorgon with blue pythons for hair, and a black spider drider.

Koko paled. "N...No way!" she shouted at the sight of them all.

As the panic-stricken mob ran through the area, the table you and Koko were at was knocked over and as you hit the ground you're knocked out from the impact and the giant centaur with the lower body of a quagga snatched you up in her hand.
131111222222212112211.title: Vivian Hires Another Assassin

1311112222222121122111.content:
You grunt as you struggle and hear the tapping of hooves. You then look up to see Mariah staring at you with a wicked smile. "You and me are going to have so much fun little man." You scream. "Koko!" you yell. "Help!" But at this point, Mariah is far away from Koko and is running faster.

Koko tries to get up but Ursula attacks her and manages to knock her right in half. Being a jiang-si and therefore already undead, the assault isn't lethal, but Koko is still in pain. Ursula turns to face Arethusa who is throwing bombs to destroy what's left of the festival while Persephone is busy eating the corpse of a pandaren she had killed. "We got what we came for, let's go." Sakuya crawls up to Ursula and gives a pout. "But I'm not done playing!" she yells as she shakes blood off three of her spider legs. Yuri glares at Sakuya as her snakes let out a hiss. "Don't forget Sakuya," she says. "Just because you committed the most crimes doesn't mean you're the most dangerous.

One dragon gets up and he tries to fight off the criminals with his fire breath but Yuri smirks and turns around before she takes off her sunglasses, giving the dragon a view of her deadly eyes. The dragon gives out a dying scream as he's turned into stone. Yuri then takes off the head and gives a sadistic laugh as she puts her glasses back on. Persephone lets out a growl. "What did you do that for you Yuri?" asks Persephone. "Dragon meat is simply divine with white rice. I could've eaten that dragon." Arethusa's eyes pop and she glares at Persephone. Being a dragon, she found that statement obviously insulting. In retaliation Arethusa blows fire at Persephone and forces the albino werewolf to blow on her tail. "Watch it dragon lips," she says. "Or I'll eat you too."

"Don't worry Persephone," says Ursula as that grizzly giantess scratches her stomach. "We'll all get our chance with the little human." "Well that Mariah better not try anything before we get there," says Sakuya. "She's the only one of us who hasn't killed anything bigger than a human." Koko manages to escape by crawling behind an over turned stand as she panted. "Hey," says Arethusa. "Where's the other jiang-si she hired us to get as well." Koko gasps in her hiding spot and realizes just who hired those villains. "Who cares?" asks Ursula. "We can get back to her later. We'll torture the human now." All those evil monsters laugh wickedly at their devious plan.

At that time, Mariah brings you back to the hideout, which appears to be a closed bowling factory. Mariah lays you down on a table and looks down on you evilly as you shake. She looks like your centaur neighbor Zelda, except she has white and brown stripes on her horse body and her back legs are plain brown. You heard about Mariah from Petra, seeing as Petra was the one who arrested her. She was found guilty of rape against hundreds of monsters. While all centaurs were violent and raunchy, even they found her despicable because she would grab hold of random people without any warning.

Mariah stares down at you and cracks an evil smirk. "Wh-What do you want?" "Well, after that dullahan failed, Vivian sent for us." You gasp. "Vivian Wong." "You're pretty smart for a human," says Mariah with a vicious tone in her voice. "We can do whatever we want to you. But I think I'll have my fun before the others."

You're terrified at what plans Mariah has for you and then you see that rapist centaur turn around and point to her backside. She gives you a threatening look and you step back. You knew what she was planning and try to run but Mariah blocks with her hand and smiles evilly.
1311112222222121122111.title: Bad Situation

13111122222221211222.content:
"Here we are." Says Koko. "Home again. Home again." You let out a sigh. You had just gotten used to living with Cadence and now you have to live with your new owner Koko. I guess you could get used to that. But when it looks like Koko is about to answer the door, Layla jumps out and then slams Koko's head into the ground and makes her let out a grunt. "Koko!" you yell. But then Layla grabs you and pulls you up to her headless neck and you let out a gasp.

Layla then holds her head in front of you and it towers over you like a skyscraper. "Oh don't worry," she says evilly. "She's just unconscious. I couldn't kill that jiang shi if I tried. But you on the other hand. Vivian Wong wants a little word with you." You gasp before Layla closes her hand sealing you inside. You're trembling as she walks out of the apartment. She is extra careful to avoid detection and passes Nefernina who appeared to have lost one of her eyes and was checking the ground. Layla leaps over Nefernina and Nefernina turns around to see Alicia walking by and assumes Alicia touched her before slapping the jabberwock in the face.

Soon Layla takes you to a Chinese style mansion, that must be where Vivian lives. Layla jumps up to the window and taps on the wall. Vivian walks up to her bedroom window and gestures for Layla to come in. Layla opens her hand to reveal you before Vivian hands Layla her money and the dullahan makes her escape.

Vivian lets out an evil laugh and brings you up to her face before pulling away her card and giving you a vicious look. "Nobody insults Vivian Wong, especially not an insignificant human bug." "Geez. And I thought Nefernina had anger issues. It was just a few minor insults. You brought it on yourself badmouthing my friend." Then Vivian begins to squeeze you and makes you scream. "Koko won't be coming to your rescue tonight human and neither will the zombie friend she mentioned. You will face the wrath of Wong. When I'm through with you, you'll wish that a monster had devoured you long ago.

You give a gulp. This was it. Vivian was going to show you no mercy. What's gonna happen to you now?
13111122222221211222.title: Layla snags You

choices: More torture...Vivian's extra careful NOT to kill you, she likes you to suffer
Vivian thinks you might make a good slave
131111222222212112221.content:
Vivian licked her lips as you locked eyes with her. You could practically see all the cluel idea she has planned for you running back and forth behind her eyes.

You were tempted to ask if an aplogy would help, but you knew better than that. ANYBODY that was worse then Nefernina couldn't be reasoned with.

"Now human...there are so many ways to torture you, I'm having trouble deciding, so I'll just start now." Vivian said, placing you on her middle finger's knuckle and then pinned your head down with her index finger under your chin and your legs under her ring finger, then started to attempt to raise her middle finger slowly.

You felt like screaming as you felt your spine bending, about to snap, when the pressure vanishes as Vivian drops you.
As you fell, Vivian kicked out and you are launced forward as you catch the tip of her toe, Vivian laughing hysterically. With a loud thud you bang your head against the wall, blood oozing from one of your temples. It wasnt enough to kill you but it sure hurt like hell. Ricochetings off of the wall you landed again with a thud on the hardwood floor. Groaning in pain you try to stand up but before you could raise yourself, you felt a series of booming thuds and when you raised your head, found Vivian's face inches from you, a smirk making its way along her lips.

You gasp as you look at the blue-skinned Jiang Shi. Mercy...? No, that wasn't it. She wanted to torture you, and if you die too quick, she'd be deprived of her fun. Vivian smirks at you and you find yorself wishing for Lupa, the werewolf was much MUCH more welcoming...and she wanted to eat you alive!

"Aww...is my little prisoner hurt?" Vivian cooed mockingly "GOOD! she reached down and picked you up and tossed you onto a cushion.you saw her butt heading for you. You closed your eyes as she landed on you. It was an odd sensation to be crushed by two soft objects. Thankfully it was this softness that prevented you from being reduced to a red smear. She stood and you look upas her free hand closed around you and put you on a table.

As you catch your breath after the shocking run in with Lupa, you curiously began to gaze upon the interiors of the strange apartment you just entered. Adorned about the inside of the living room was a vast array of towering furniture, as well as oriental decoration. The décor overall immediately gave hints of Japanese culture back on earth. Growing even more curious by the surrounding room, you soon began to explore about only to soon catch a glimpse of a framed photograph hanging on one of the walls.

With closer inspection the photo was that of an eastern dragon, a rather young one at about 13 years old. Unlike western dragons that seemed to carry scales over their body, this dragons body was completely covered by a light brown shade of fur. The sides of her snout appeared to have very small whiskers that barely made it down her neck, unlike the really long ones that most eastern dragons were famous for. 'Just who was this girl?' you thought. As you continued to gaze upon the picture, the sudden sounds of explosive booms and shaking floors immediately caught your attention. Having lived with monsters for quite a while, you knew all too well what was occurring. Someone was coming.

With quick haste you began to turn your head about the living room trying to find some place to hide. After gazing about, the first thing that caught your sight was the small area underneath one of the sofas. With little hesitation, you sprint as fast as you can towards the lower opening before leaping straight underneath the massive furniture piece. Veiled under the shadows, you curiously peer out into the room in hopes of catching sight of the apartment owner.

As the tremors and booms began to grow much forceful and louder, a huge clawed foot soon stomps several yards away from you. Your eyes slowly peer upwards only to gaze in surprise at the sight. The owner of the house was none other than the dragon in the photo! if not a bit older at about 19 or 20. The whiskers on her face were still short as she was garbed in a sweater and shorts. Her eyes scanned about the area as if she was searching for something. Just then it hit you. Could she possibly be searching for you? Your heart nearly froze at the thought of being found out, especially since you had no idea whether or not she was friendly or hostile like Lupa. Your worries soon died away however as she soon bent down to pick up a tea cup from one of the tables and began to head off. With the coast clear, you soon make your way out from underneath the couch back into the light.

By now Lupa must have gone away, or so you hoped. Unsure whether it was safe to leave, you decide to try and peek underneath the door frame to catch any glimpse of Lupa's wolfish form. As you began to walk however, a sudden strange sensation began to overcome you. While it certainly didn't hurt, it was very tingly and odd to say the least. All about you, the surroundings slowly began to shrink slightly as you were back to your normal, albeit tiny size. As the strange sensation still emerged in your body, you unknowingly end up bumping onto a rather hard surface besides you. Quickly you look at the strange object to discover that you bumped into a rather loose pile of plates. To your horror, the sounds of shaking immediately cause your head to gaze upwards as you helplessly watch an ornate plate crash right onto the hard ground shattering into pieces.

Quickly, you turn your back only to gaze up in horror as the gargantuan dragoness was gazing down at your tiny form with a scowl on her face. Within a few seconds, you were lifted right before her colossal snout as her massive orbs stare sternly at you. while still wrapped up in what you discovered was the tip of her tail, your arms began to uncontrollably shake unsure just what this monster was planning to do to you.

"who are you?" she asks with the scowl still glued upon her face. You try your best to try and reply, but the only thing your mouth managed to do was clatter nervously. "Who are you?" she asks once more in a much more irritated yet stern tone.

"I-I'm R.L!" you quickly reply as your body continued to shake, unsure if she was waiting for the right time to simply drop you to the floor or force something even worse upon you.

"what is it that you are doing in my house?" She continues to question as her expression became even more agitated with each passing second. Without any hesitation at all, you explain your run in with Lupa and how you had no choice but to enter her apartment or become a snack to the gluttonous canine.

"I-it might sound like an unlikely story, but you have to trust me!" You beseech her, hoping that she wouldn't think of you as some sort of tiny liar or thief. While she did carry the very stern expression throughout your explanation, by the time you were finished, it seemed that her agitation began to die down slightly. Just then, the sound of a thud from outside emanated near the door frame as your tiny form was soon moved away from the coil of her tail and straight into her right hand. Luckily for you, she took care not to grip too much around your body as she made her way to the door frame. With the swiftest of movements, she swung the door wide open only to reveal Lupa hunched on the floor to the right.

"o-oh!" Lupa stammers with wide eyes as she gazes up at the dragoness. "I see you're our new neighbor." she says while giving a toothy grin, almost as if she was trying her best to hide her true cruel nature. "I heard a crash outside and came wondering what was going on." she explains as she soon stood up to her full height. To your shock, her eyes soon gaze upon your tiny form within the dragonesses hand. "Oh! and I see you found the culprit!" she says giving a smirk.

'Culprit!?' you thought with wide eyes. Just what on earth was Lupa planning this time!?

"you know of this human?" The Dragoness asks as she soon looks down upon you as well.

"but of course!" Lupa says in a rather nonchalant tone along with a small downwards wave with her wrist. "this little human here is a troublemaker for sure!" she states in an accusing tone. A huge shudder of nervousness as well as rage build up inside you by her deceitful words. Was this her trick all along!? to make it seem like you're the terrible person who snuck into this dragonesses house!?

"He's been causing plenty of trouble around the apartment complex, but most of all, He's been giving me the most trouble of all." Lupa says with a nod of her head.

'Yeah right! if you call trying to run for your life to avoid getting eaten trouble making!' your mind shouts as you soon end up glaring up at Lupa's lying form.

"tell you what." Lupa smiles before extending her furred hand towards the dragoness. "how about you let me take him off your shoulders? that way I can deal with him...accordingly."

Lupa's request immediately caused the shudders and shivers from before to return to your body. Your head quickly turns back up at the dragonesses face as she occasionally glanced down at your form. It seemed like your fate was within this clueless dragonesses hand. (no pun intended)
