1311112222222222221.content:
Once inside the confines of the apartment, you let out a long sigh of relief form your narrow escape from the ever so relentless hunger of Lupa. After regaining your composure from the mad dash, your eyes soon begin to wander about the interiors of the random apartment. To be honest, it looked just like any other normal home as expected. Couches decorated the inside of the living room, as a rather large, if not tacky looking rug decorated the middle area of the floor. Curiously, you begin to step a bit further inside the room, not wanting to see if Lupa was still out by the doorway waiting for an attempted escape. After only taking a few strides deeper inside the so called living room, to your sudden surprise a voice resonates from an open hallway to the right.

"Hello? who's there?" a feminine voice asks from out of sight. Your eyes widen in surprise by the sudden question as you wondered whether or not the person she was asking was none other than you. But, that seemed completely impossible. At your size, there was no way someone like Candence could spot you from such a distance. Unless...Unless the monster that inhabited this very apartment was capable of catching the scent of something from afar so easily, almost like...a wolf? Your heart nearly freezes at the thought as the sudden sounds of footsteps began to close in towards your location. Without the least bit of hesitation, you quickly sprint with all your might to hide underneath one of the great chairs behind the supporting right leg.

Within moments, the tremors and thunderous steps of the apartment inhabitant only grew much more stronger before you finally managed to catch a glimpse of a massive light brown paw slam down mere yards away from you. If the sight of the paw wasn't enough, then what happened next was enough to nearly give you a heart attack. In just seconds, a gargantuan wolfish head soon lowered downwards upon the wooden floor sideways, as if examining your whereabouts. Luckily for you though, her eyes didn't manage to lock down upon your miniscule form as she scanned under the chair frame. As her eyes darted all about the shadowy area, her huge black nose would continuously inhale, as if trying to track down your scent.

"I know you're here." she says with a slightly raised brow. "a wolves nose never lies. and judging by your smell...you're really close by."

The news of her knowing just where you were nearly froze your blood as you try your best to remain perfectly still in your hiding place.

"come on." she says in a rather surprisingly warm tone. "If you come out now, then I won't call the authorities on you."

Your eyes suddenly grow by her sudden threat. Now that she mentioned it, what you were doing was basically intruding within someone else's home, and not knowing the many different laws incorporated within this Monster society could easily be considered a great offense to a human being like you. Not wanting to deal with the police, you reluctantly begin to walk your way out of your hiding place right towards her huge face. As you slowly make your way closer to the massive wolfess, her great green eyes begin to widen upon viewing your body. It wasn't too long before you were standing only a couple yards away from her massive snout. As you gaze upon her, a nervous shudder quickly runs down your entire body unsure if this wolfess was the equivalent of Lupa or terrifying enough, worse.

Awkwardly enough, seconds of nothing but pure silence began to pass by as the two of you were staring straight within each other eyes. It wasn't too long however before the silence was ultimately broken.

"a-a....a human?" She stammers ultimately shocked and dazed by your appearance.

"y-yeah?" You reply as the nervous shudders continued to course about your entire body, unsure just what this mighty canine planned on doing next.

To your ultimate surprise, her somewhat stupefied expression quickly changed into that of surprise and amazement as a smile soon begins to form upon her muzzle. "r-really?" she stammers once more.

Slowly you nod your head as your nervous state soon began to die down and become replaced by confusion. Did this massive werewolf ever encounter a human being before? Then again, there was no telling just where she originally came from in this monster populated world.

The smile on her furred face quickly began to grow in size upon confirmation of your species as she lets out what could only be considered a squeal of excitement. "I cant believe it! A human being! A REAL human being!" she says in an excited tone.

Your confusion soon flew off the deep end by her sudden outburst of happiness. "errr..." you mutter unsure just what to say to this excited wolfess. "errr...not to sound rude or anything, but what's so special about a human?" you ask, hoping deep down that it didn't have anything to do with being a delicacy.

The wolfess soon gets down on all fours in a pose that almost resembled a pouncing position while keeping her eyes glued to you. "errr...sorry about that." she chuckles awkwardly while giving an awkward grin. "this is my first time encountering a human being." she admits in a slightly abashed tone.

"w-well...there's a first for everything." you awkwardly chuckle as your tenseness begins to dwindle down by her odd friendly behavior. "but...why be so excited about seeing a human? I mean, compared to you monsters we're not exactly that great." To tell the truth, it did hurt a bit to say something so demeaning about your very species.

"Oh don't say that!" she quickly says with wide eyes. "I've been interested in human beings for years now!"

"For... years?" Just what was up with this strange wolfess? "errr...If I may ask, just why are you so interested in humans?...I-I mean...I-it doesn't have to do with taste does it?" a nervous tingle runs down your spine by your second question, unsure if she planned on using you for some sort of snack or worse.

"oh no no no no no!" she quickly shakes her head, as her rather long silver hair gently swayed behind her head. "Well...you see..." she stammers while averting her eyes slightly abashed. "I'm well...sort of an enthusiast when it comes to humans." she admits with a small chuckle.

"An enthusiast?" you raise a brow unsure by just what she could mean by the word enthusiast.

"Yeah! I mean, you human beings are so interesting!" she says as the grin quickly reappears on her face. "Despite your really tiny size...e-errr no offense, there's just so much I want to learn about you!" she states as her large furry tail begins to swish back and forth happily behind her.

You just couldn't believe it. This strange tenant, who is the exact same species as that gluttonous evil being Lupa, was interested about you. Well to be specific more towards your species in general. A great wave of relief soon washes down your body seeing as how this giant monster seemed to pose no threat towards you at all.

"Oh! I didn't introduce myself." she says before slowly reaching her hand towards you and extending her pinky finger. "I'm Gabriella Snapper."

Without hesitation, you gently grasp her huge pinky and shake it firmly. "R.L." you reply as a small smile draws upon your face.

"Well, R.L. pleased to meet you." Gabriella says as she closes her eyes and gives a warm smile. "anyways, just how did you get in my apartment?" she asks curiously with a slightly tilted head. You soon begin to explain your encounter with Lupa and just how you managed to stumble within her home.

"Oh that's terrible!" Gabriella says as she covers her mouth slightly with her left hand. "It must be extremely tough to live in someplace inhabited with monsters like that wolfess."

"you can say that again..." you mutter under your breath.

"well...seeing as how we just got acquainted, I'd be more than happy to take you back to your apartment." she says with a small nod to follow.

"really?" you gaze up at her with a grateful smile. "I'd really appreciate that Gabriella."

"oh please, just call me Gabby." she says with a small giggle. "but." she interjects with her index finger pointing upwards. "you could...well, stay here if you'd like." she says rather awkwardly. "t-that is if you'd want!" she stammers. "I mean, I wouldn't mind learning more about you human beings while you stay here."

"wait...you mean... you couldn't see me?" you ask somewhat surprised that only up until now when she put on those glasses could she get a good view of your appearance.

"yup." Gabby nods with the smile still on her face, though in a somewhat awkward fashion. "My eyes aren't really that good." she chuckles causing you to lightly shake on her palm. So that sort of explains why she was having trouble trying to spot you underneath the chair. "Anyways" se interjects before making her way back to her living room. "mind if I ask you some questions?" she asks curiously. "I-I mean, there's just so much I want to know about you humans!" she beamed excitedly.

You were nearly taken aback by just how excited she was, but to the best of your abilities try to remain composed. "sure, ask away!" you say wit a nod.

Once Gabby began talking, the questions were relatively easy to answer. Questions ranging from, 'how is it like being so small?' to 'how is it without having any fur?' were pretty easy to answer considering this was coming from your viewpoint, though it wasn't too long before she began asking about life on Earth. To the best of your ability you began to explain all you could to her about how it was like back in the human world. Several times, Gabby's eyes would widen like a child listening to some sort of fairy tale story. As the two of you continue with the conversation, you too began to learn more about the monster world as well. Things like unique types of games, to even a bit of geography were brought up that you just couldn't help but ask more about. Soon enough though, time began to fly by as minutes soon turned to several hours.

"are you serious?" Gabby says while bursting out in a fit of laughter.

"yeah!" you reply as you end up joining in on the laughter. "some movies back on earth are just that terrible!" you state recalling several times when so called 'amazing' movies would only turn out becoming flops. After finally managing to catch your breath, your eyes avert to the right only to gaze upon the wall clocks hands. 9:30 pm. "wow...time really does fly." you mutter as Gabby soon turns her attention to the clock as well.

"yeah." she nods before gazing down at your tiny form once again. "well...thank you so much for explaining all that to me." she says giving a warm smile.

"no prob Gabby." you reply while getting up in a standing stance.

"R.L." she says with a slightly tilted head. "mind if we...talked again sometime later?" she asks in an almost pleading tone.

Seeing as how you just made a new monster friend, how could you refuse?

"Sure Gabby." you nod your head with a smile.

The great Wolfess returns a great smile back upon your tiny form. "alright then, shall I take you back to your apartment?" she asks.
13111122222222222212.title: Day with a wolfess.

choices: Lupa strikes to get R.L for herself
131111222222222222121.content:
"That sounds like a good idea." you reply along with a rather relieved nod of your head. It did seem like a much safer bet of reaching your apartment with Gabby's help, especially when the other tenants of the apartment could easily crush you at such a small size. Slowly, The gargantuan wolfess rises upwards taking extra care not to shake her right hand in the process to through you off balance. After a few seconds, Gabby soon stood on her two legs and began to make her way to her apartments doorway. With a twist of the door knob, she started walking her way outside into the apartment complex. Once out in the open however, a great sense of dread began to envelop your mind as you feared that Lupa could be anywhere waiting to strike. After months of experience, it seemed no matter where you were around the apartments she still managed to catch your scent. As you turn your head about nervously to spot any sign of the evil wolfess, your attention was soon diverted as Gabby began to speak.

"So...thanks again for talking with me." she says while giving a small if not awkward smile on her muzzle.

"not a problem." you reply as your eyes soon turn to focus upon her face.

"I know it must've been quite...well... strange to encounter a crazed wolfess like me." she chuckles while using her free hand to scratch the sides of her ears. "I mean, it must sound extremely strange for a human to meet a monster who is really intrigued by humans..."

"I wouldn't call it weird." You reply as you give a small shrug of your shoulders. "I mean, when it comes to monsters like werewolves the first thing that pops in mind to a lot of us humans are how ferocious and hungry they are...err..no offense."

"none taken." Gabby giggles lightly at the comment.

"and to be honest, I'm actually really grateful that I managed to encounter someone who's...well, unbiased when it comes to humans." While they were indeed some neutral tenants within the apartment complex, you were just glad that there was another member to add to the list.

As you gaze up at Gabby, you can't help but spot a small shade of pink beginning to form underneath the valley of fur on her cheeks.

"even if this unbiased monster is a bit different compared to others?" she asks with a chuckle as she closes her eyes.

"eh, There's nothing wrong with being different." you add as Gabby's eyes began to grow slightly from the comment. Soon enough, a warm expression grows on her face as she gives a quick nod.

"Thanks R.L." she says in a sincere manner. "Hey! maybe next time we meet we could watch a movie at my place?" Gabby Muses already thinking about the next meet up. "I have plenty of movies from romance to action...errr..mainly action and the like." she chuckles abashedly causing you to lightly bounce about her leathery padded palm.

"sounds like a good idea to me." you reply as a smile draws upon your face. Just as your nerves were beginning to calm after the small chat, a sudden voice towards the left causes you to jump in shear surprise.

"I knew you were here R.L." Lupa's voice says in an almost satisfied tone. "I could never forget your scent no matter what." Moments after the words, the rather large Wolfess soon steps underneath one of the hallway lights before Gabby and you.

"Who are you?" Gabby asks with a raised brow. While she didn't express it. you could easily tell by the look of Gabby's eyes that she didn't trust Lupa one bit.

"Oh! we didn't meet before did we?" Lupa says smiling warmly as she walks her way towards Gabby. "Call me Lupa. I'm so sorry I couldn't introduce myself earlier. I mean, how rude is it to not get acquainted with a fellow werewolf?" she says giving a toothy smirk.

"I'm Gabby." Gabby introduces herself in a rather calm yet stern tone as her hand, along with you, begin to move closer to her body. Lupa immediately notices her actions as her huge eyes gaze down upon your miniscule form. Just by making contact with Lupa's huge orbs, you could see the obsessed hunger she has towards you. "oh! I see you've met the human of this apartment complex." Lupa muses as she lowers her head slightly to get a better look at you.

"yes...I have." Gabby says as she brings your tiny form even closer towards her so that you were now against the fabric of her shirt.

After a brief moment of silence Lupa spoke once more. "well?" she asks with a tilted head as she raises her head up to stare at Gabby with a smile.

"yes?" Gabby asks as she gazes at Lupa ultimately confused.

"aren't you going to eat him?" Lupa asks. "It's customary for a wolf to eat it's prey once they manage to catch it, and...lucky you." Just by the final comment, it seemed as though Lupa sounded pained for not being able to eat you...that or she made it sound that way.

Gabby stares at Lupa with slightly wide eyes by the question before taking a second to regain her composure. "I don't think so." she replies ultimately shocking Lupa by the words.

"...come again?" Lupa asks with a stupefied, if not priceless, expression glued upon her face.

"I said I don't think so." Gabby repeats as Lupa continues to stare in disbelief.

"ah! I see, just saving him for later then?" Lupa asks as she tries her best to collect herself from the comment. "I mean, you could have him for a snack anytime soon, so-"

"I'm not going to eat him." Gabby quickly states in a stern tone before Lupa even had a chance to finish.

"w-what?" Lupa stammers in shock.

"I won't eat him and that's that. Now if you'll excuse me." Gabby says in an annoyed tone as she began to walk her way past Lupa. As you gaze up at the fiendish werewolf, a look of complete shock and disbelief was adorned on her face as her head turns to follow Gabby's form. Without a single word, Gabby continued to make her way downwards the hall.
131111222222222222121.title: An unexpected meeting

choices: Something happens that's in Gabby's favor
1311112222222222221211.content:
While it did seem like the trouble was all over, A sudden yelp escapes Gabby as she suddenly finds her form falling forwards towards the floor. With the swiftest of movements, the giant werewolf closes her hand into a light fist around R.L. to insure his safety from the imminent fall. Within the confines of Gabby's closed fist, R.L. soon found gravity shifting his body upwards against her padded fingers as her massive form began to descend towards the ground. In a mere second, both end up colliding onto the rough surface of the apartments outer hall. While such a blow would have been fatal to a human like R.L., whether it was luck or Gabby's quick thinking, he was miraculously unscathed from the fall. Quickly, he gets up into a sitting position within Gabby's fist trying to collect himself from the terrifying event. As he attempted to calm his nerves however, a sudden yelp from above causes him to leap in shock. There was no doubt who was the provoker of the sudden plummet.

"You know...you're really something." Lupa says in a completely annoyed tone as her furred foot was placed firmly upon Gabby's back. "here you are with the chance of a lifetime...A chance I have been waiting months for...and you reject it." A pained cringe begins to emerge on Gabby's face as Lupa began to apply more pressure upon her.

"s-so what!?" Gabby shouts while trying her best to catch her breath from the sudden stomp. "He's a living being just like us! no...he's more than that, he's my friend!" she shouts. "why would some voracious werewolf like you want him so bad!?" she interjects while turning to glare back at the attacking Lupa. "why not just stuff your face with some werepig instead?"

With an irritated expression overtaking her face, Lupa lifts her leg up in the quickest of motions before stomping once more. "oh that's rich!" Lupa growls. "A werewolf, lecturing another werewolf about what to eat. Listen up pup! meat is apart of my lifestyle...our lifestyles! everyday we werewolves eat some helpless creature, so what's so wrong about eating a human?" Lupa asks as she began to kneel down before the back of Gabby's head. "don't fool yourself over 'friendship' with other species, they're nothing but snacks."

"to you... but not me!" Gabby interjects as she quickly rams the back of her head against Lupa's snout full force. A yowl of pain escapes Lupa as she quickly places her hands before her snout and backs away. Taking the brief moment of freedom, Gabby quickly gets up on her feet before opening her hand to gaze at R.L's tiny form. "sorry R.L..." she says in a quick and stammering voice. "but this is for your own safety." Before R.L. could even get the opportunity to ask what she meant, Gabby quickly pulls his body closer towards her body without hesitation. With wide eyes, he watches as his werewolf companion begins to open the collar of her shirt and bring his body towards the opening. In a swift movement, R.L is sent straight into the shirt towards Gabby's huge bosoms where his small form lands within the crevice between the werewolf's breasts. A massive shade of red fills R.L.'s face as the warm soft fur of Gabby's body surrounded his entire body. The light source within the shirt was soon sealed off as Gabby retracted her finger allowing the collar to snap close.

"You bitch!" Lupa snarls as she quickly leaps upon Gabby ferociously. No sooner did Lupa strike did the two werewolves begin to brawl. Within Gabby's shirt, R.L finds himself being tossled all about from the movements, yet still tries his best to remain in place firmly between the huge mammaries. Gabby, knowing full well what Lupa desired, snapped and clawed at the wolfess trying her best to prevent her from claiming her so called 'snack'.

"Give him here!" Lupa demands as she returns a flurry of swipes and snaps upon Gabby's form in a seemingly desperate attempt in claiming R.L.. To her growing annoyance though, Gabby continuously returned attacks and blocks having no intent at all in granting her desire.
1311112222222222221211.title: Wolf fight

13111122222222222212111.content:
As Gabby and Lupa continued their skirmish with one another, R.L. felt like he was on the verge of losing his lunch by how quick and dizzying the movements were within Gabby's shirt. To him it almost felt like a roller coaster ride, one that was filled with countless loops and dips with virtually no sign of stopping. As R.L was attempting his best to remain firmly within the werewolf's cleavage, outside Lupa was trying her best to catch any sight of R.L. upon her opponent. While she could definitely smell his familiar aroma emanating from around Gabby's form, she still couldn't pinpoint his exact whereabouts.

"Just give him here before I actually hurt you!" Lupa threatens as Gabby quickly takes the opportunity to kick her stomach back.

"I said no!" Gabby exclaims as her entire form almost appeared to be riddled with bruises and cuts.

"Persistent little bitch." Lupa snarls before leaping to tackle the downed werewolf once more.

Within Gabby's shirt, a sudden impact from outside suddenly causes R.L to get propelled straight out of the firm safety of Gabby's cleavage. In a mere instant, he soon finds himself upon the soft warm fur that adorned Gabby's abdomen before another quick blow from outside causes him to fly upwards from the impact. After an inelegant landing back on the fur, R.L. looks upwards at the fabric of the shirt mortified. If he remained too long in one specific area, then there was no doubt that he would end up a mere stain on Gabby's fur. With shaking legs, he furiously begins to make a mad dash down the plain of fur, hoping to luckily escape on to the Apartment floors. Just as he was nearing the mid section of the stomach however, a sudden turn of Gabby's body causes him to end up tumbling straight towards the midsection of her abdomen. Just as things couldn't get worse, a sudden blow from Lupa outside propels him upwards once more towards the fabric of the shirt.

As he was airborne, R.L. clenches his eyes close bracing for the impact upon Gabby's body. As expected, he soon lands upon the soft fur of her belly which luckily manages to break his fall. Just when he thought the worse was over briefly, another sudden twist from Gabby causes him to tumble his way downwards. Unable to get any good bearing from the quick movements, R.L was at the mercy of gravity to guide him. After what seemed like minutes to him, R.L was suddenly ceased in movements as he was soon cast in a dark and unfamiliar area. While he could still feel the many movements and attacks emanating from around him, for some odd reason there didn't seem o be so much movement wherever he was.

As the two wolves continued fighting, a sudden shout from nearby quickly broke up the duel. "What's going on here!?" a feline figure demands as she makes her way within the light of the hallway.

"Of all the people..." Lupa mutters as she glares upon Patsy's form.

"Why are you making so much ruckus?" Patsy demands with an irritated scowl on her face. "and just what the hell do you think you're doing to this girl?"

"None of your business." Lupa spat as she slowly albeit painfully rises up into a standing position. "Why don't you just go inside and continue working on that stupid bike of yours?"

Patsy was not the least bit impressed by her words as she makes her way towards the large wolfess and pokes her neckline with a clawed finger. "Now you listen here you pudgy bitch! Don't think I heard you starting this whole thing." she threatens causing Lupa's eyes to widen slightly.

"I'm proof of you assaulting a fellow tenant, and I'm pretty sure that's enough to get your fat ass evicted from this place faster than you can eat a whole cow." she states with glaring eyes. "Now why don't you do what's best and make your way home with your tail between your legs puppy?"

With a growl Lupa immediately swipes Patsy's finger away from her body as she begins to limp away from the two. As the large wolfess took her leave, Patsy soon turns her attention towards the other sitting upon the floor.

"You alright?" the feline asks before extending a supportive hand towards her.

"y-yes." Gabby nods before slowly accepting Patsy's hand and making her way upwards. "t-thanks for the help." she stammers as she stands while occasional winces of pain.

"Don't mention it." Patsy says while examining her body. "Looks like she really did a number on you." she states gazing upon the many injuries adorning the werewolf's body. "speaking of which, just what happened?" she asks with a tilted head. "I could clearly tell Lupa started the fight by her annoying voice alone, but just what caused her to suddenly start attacking you?" Patsy questions.

"Well, she was trying to get R.L while-" a quick gasp escapes Gabby's mouth as she momentarily forgot about the safety of her human companion. "R.L!" she shouts before looking down her body in shock.

"R.L?" Patsy cocks her head to the side utterly confused. "you mean that human who lives here?"

"Yes!" Gabby answers as she quickly peeks within the collar of her shirt trying to spot any form of her human friend inside. "Lupa was trying to get R.L. so I hid him for safety." she quickly adds as a small bout of nervous whimpers began to emerge. "R.L, where are you!" Gabby asks still feverishly gazing within her shirt.

While he was still within the dark unknown area, R.L managed to hear the whole conversation between Patsy and Lupa. As the banter ended, a large sigh of relief escapes him as the fight soon came to a conclusion. After a few sudden movements, no doubt from Gabby, he was soon shocked to hear his name being called from above. "I'm fine!" he shouts as loud as he could from within the dark confines of his location.

Gabby's ears immediately poke upward by the sound of the familiar voice. "R.L! are you alright?" she asks in an agitated tone still searching for his whereabouts.

"I'm fine!" R.L. replies as loud as he could causing a great sense of relief to wash down the wolfess's body.

"Where are you?" she asks as she continues scanning from within the collar of her shirt, even going as far as looking at the apartment floors.

"I was going to ask you the same thing." R.L replies still snugly placed within his odd safe haven.

"Try to move around a bit." Gabby insists. "that way it'll be easier to spot or feel you."

Acknowledging her words, R.L begins to squirm as much as he could from his odd dark area, hoping Gaby would be able to tell where he was. Above, an audible yelp escapes Gabby's mouth as her eyes begins to widen in surprise. A dark shade of red begins to form on her furred face as she began to feel a small sensation emerging from slightly below the insides of her shorts waistband.

"can you feel me?" R.L asks unsure if Gabby can notice him.

"y-yeah..." Gabby stammers as the blush grew deeper on her face while averting her eyes downwards. Slowly she looks at Patsy who gazes at her with wide eyes and an awkward expression glued on her face.

"errr...go ahead." Patsy says before turning so that her back was facing Gabby. With little reluctance Gabby reaches her hands downwards to open up the waistband of her shorts. From R.L's perspective, a great beam of light quickly emanates from above his location as he soon finds himself slipping downwards an odd pink surface. As his body finally ceased it's descent by a wall behind him, he soon realizes that the odd wall of pink almost appeared like something akin to fabric. Not only that, but a rather strong warmth radiated from within the wall of pink. While gazing at the odd surface, a shadow quickly catches his attention as he was soon enveloped in a furred surface, no doubt Gabby's hand. As his body was hoisted upwards, his eyes quickly widen in shock as he finally catches a glimpse of where he was hiding for the time being. The glimpse of Gabby's panties was enough to form a crimson shade upon his face as he was soon lifted upwards towards the face of the massive wolfess.

"W-Was I in?" R.L. stammers finding it hard to believe where he was the whole time.

"Y-yeah." Gabby replies with complete honestly as the deep blush remains on her face.

"Well...this was quite a night." Patsy says as she slowly turns to face the two. "anyways, do you need a lift to the hospital?" she offers. "I haven't used my motorcycle for a whole day now and it must be getting lonely down there." Gabby turns to look at Patsy who slowly gives a long stretch followed by a small groan.
13111122222222222212111.title: an unexpected means of victory

choices: "She's fine minus some bruises and scratches."
131111222222222222121111.content:
As R.L gazes down at Gabby's body from the vantage point of her palm, it was clearly obvious that she was in pretty bad shape. "I think it'd be best if we get you some medical help Gabby." he insists with a hint of nervousness in his voice. Gabby simply lowers her eyes down upon his form before giving a simple nod of her head.

"yeah..." she mutters as she cringes slightly from an open cut down near her right thigh.

"So is it a yes or no?" Patsy asks as she finishes up her stretch followed by a small sigh.

"It's a yes." Gabby replies as she brings R.L's form closer towards her neckline for safety.

"Alright then, give me a second." Patsy replies as she makes her way down the hall a few yards to enter her apartment. After around a minute or so, the ginormous cat woman soon reappears under the slightly flickering light of the hallway. Garbed in a leather jacket and carrying an extra helmet o her left hand, she begins to make her way back towards the two.

"Since when did you have two helmets?" R.L asks in confusion remembering countless times when Patsy adorned the same helmet for weeks straight.

"Hey, a biker's always gotta be prepared." Patsy replies while giving a nonchalant shrug before handing the spare helmet to Gabby. "here you are. Hopefully it'll fit your head and not slide off when we're out on the road." Accepting the helmet, Gabby carefully begins to strap the safety headgear on as her and Patsy began to make their way to the apartments parking lot. Waiting in it's everyday area, waxed and shining with the lights of the sky high moon was Patsy's pride and joy. "Miss me?" She says with a smile while approaching her beloved motorcycle. While R.L did see Patsy with her motorcycle from quite a distance away, it was quite odd to see her talking to the two wheeled vehicle. In truth, he didn't know whether or not she had a great love for the biker lifestyle, or if she was completely fixated on her motorcycle alone.

"climb aboard, and make sure not to scratch or bend anything." Patsy states as she positions herself upon the seat of her motorcycle. Whether or not she was joking or being serious though was a complete mystery. As soon as Gabby sits down behind the cat biker, Patsy revs up her bike causing a loud almost thunderous roar to escape from the exhaust pipes. In no time at all, the three were soon driving down the freeway. While the speed of Patsy's driving was questionable, Gabby did make sure to keep a steady grip on R.L's tiny form while steadying herself as well. After around half an hour, the three soon made it to the closest hospital available in the area.

As Gabby was busy getting her injuries checked out, Patsy and R.L were sitting upon a row of chairs within the hospitals waiting room. For R.L, it felt extremely awkward as well as nerve wracking to sit next to another tenant of the apartment he knew very little about. While he was aware of how playful cats were back where he was from, he had absolutely no idea how a monster cat, let alone one the size of a multi-storied building would interact with him. Sitting with her arms and legs crossed, Patsy's eyes momentarily gaze down at R.L's nervous form.

"Relax shortstuff, she should be fine." she says in a tone mixed with humor and a hint of assurance.

"Patsy..." R.L says before gazing up at her. "...thanks for helping out back there." he says as a small smile began to form on the felines face followed by a small scoff.

"Eh, don't mention it." she replies with a shrug of her shoulders. "Besides, anyone who's an enemy to that bitch Lupa is a friend in my book." The comment does cause a small chuckle to escape R.L's throat before a doctor began to make their way to the two.

"Are you the two who brought in that wolfess?" a white furred tigress asks while carrying a clipboard on her right hand.

"That we are." Patsy answers as she begins to get up from the chair. "So, what's the news doc?" she asks with a slightly tilted head.

1311112222222222222.title: A weretiger?

choices: R.L asks if he could stay for a bit
R.L asks if he could leave
13111122222222222221.content:
As the fear from Lupa’s presence continued to wrack around your mind, you desperately crawl your way down past the mysterious doorway hoping to escape the devilish wolfess. While it was indeed a risky choice entering some random monster’s home uninvited, it was one hundred percent better than trying to contend with Lupa. Upon finally making your way pass the humongous doorframe, a sudden huff from Lupa emanates from the opposite side of the entryway.

“Don’t think this is over R.L.” she states in an intimidating, yet clearly peeved voice. “The moment I see your tiny ass out again, you’re snack food.” With a low growl, the sudden sounds of rhythmic yet explosive booms fill your ears before faintly disappearing with each passing second. Once all was silent, a long exhale escapes your mouth as you once again managed to evade the gluttonous lupine. “Sheesh, won’t she ever give up?” you think to yourself, knowing all too well the impossibility of such a request.

Just as you were slowly beginning to regain some self-control from the frantic chase, a sudden current of hot air ends up blasting you from behind. The sudden warm sensation upon your body quickly switches your mindset back to tense as your body stiffens in sheer horror. A nervous sweat drop slowly begins to trail its way down from the temple of your head as each exhale becomes long and shaky with each passing breath. Here you were stuck in some monsters home, uninvited, with no idea whether or not they saw humans as some sort of treat or not. Despite the gigantic doorway being only a couple yards away from you, judging by how close the breathing was it would be an impossible escape to accomplish.

Several seconds begin to pass, as you remain as still as possible before the only means of escape. It was almost as if the monster behind you was relishing in your unfavorable predicament, chuckling in their mind over just how helpless you were in their midst. As your uncontrollable body remained firmly in place, a sudden sound manages to catch you completely off guard. Behind you, a feminine voice in an almost whisper like tone begins to speak.

“Well… that was daring.” The female voice says with a small giggle to follow.

“h-huh?” you stammer, surprised by the strange sentence. “What do you mean?” you ask as your tense body slightly begins to ease up.

“You escaping that werewolf.” She replies in an almost astonished tone. “Sure you might be small, but it really seems like you know how to take care of yourself.”
She adds.

Confused and slightly abashed from her comment, you continue to remain in place, unsure if she was just playing around with words. “Well…do I have to worry about you?” You stammer, uncertain of the response.

“Well that’s rude.” She replies in an almost scolding tone. “I’m not harming you right now am I?”

“Well…there’s no telling whether or not you will try later on.” You retort as your eyes slowly avert towards the right in hopes of trying to catch some glimpse of the speaker.

“Hmmmm…” she muses for a brief moment. “Well…you do have a point.” She admits with a small titter. “I mean who knows?” She asks before you immediately notice a massive furry hand emerging from behind the left side of your body. Upon gazing at the huge limb, you immediately notice an orangish tinge adorned on the upper section of the hand mixed with black patterned stripes throughout. Just from common knowledge alone, the design was unmistakable. The very monster you were conversing with was none other than a Weretiger. “Maybe I could just end you right here and now?” She states before immediately retracting a claw from her pointer finger. The sight of the sharp nail was enough to cause a startled gasp to escape your mouth as your body instinctively shivers in terror over the idea. As you were near the verge of completely breaking down, a sudden guffaw erupts from behind which once again takes you aback.

“Then again.” She replies before retracting her claw, though leaving her hand in place. “I’m no killer.”

“T-That’s g-good to hear…” you stammer, finding it hard to speak a clear sentence without repeatedly stuttering.

“You know, this conversation won’t do.” She says before you suddenly begin to notice her hand making its way straight towards you. In just a matter of seconds your entire body from under your neck was gently constricted by her soft furry grip as you feel your body being raised skywards. The trip up was almost the equivalent to that of an amusement park ride, with your stomach being shot down with such force that you were nearly on the verge of hurling. Despite this though, you managed to keep your composure before your movements soon came to a brief stop. As your eyes soon gaze upon the new angle, to your surprise you manage to finally catch the visage of the apartment’s owner.

Great emerald green eyes with black slits gaze in an almost mesmerizing state down at you as a massive tiger face took up nearly your entire view. Upon the crown of her head were rather long locks of pure silver hair that trailed downwards in a waterfall like motion. “What?” her voice sounds off, with a hint of playfulness. “Am I too beautiful that you’re at a loss for words?” She asks while giving out a small giggle to follow.

“Well…you look nice.” You reluctantly admit while mustering a weak smile, unsure if your choice of words were favorable in her view.

“Compliment accepted.” She replies back while surprisingly returning the smile. “Now then…what is your name Human?”

“R-R.L” you quickly answer.

“R.L” The weretiger repeats while elongating the two letters with a grin. “I’m Fortuna.” She introduces herself as a toothy smile emerges on her face, revealing her sharp fangs right before you.

“N-Nice to meet you.”

“Like wise.” She replies back before a small purr begins to emerge from the depths of her throat.
13111122222222222221.title: Unexpected Weretiger encounter

131112.content:
As Lupa keeps furiously looking for you, that giant overweight werewolf breathes deeper and deeper. You try to run but the wind keeps pushing down on you and you try to scream but quickly cover your mouth. If you make so much as a sound you're dead. Then, things get much, much worse. Lupa inhaled deeply and the current of air catches you as you try to grab hold of a carpet. Too bad the wind is too strong and you're heading right for her open maw. "Crap." You whisper to yourself. You've heard of wolves blowing down houses, but this time a wolf was sucking you into her city sized mouth. If you didn't do something fast Lupa would finally swallow you.

To survive you quickly grab hold of the very tip one of her skyscraper sized teeth. You manage to pull yourself to safety as the wind stops. Once Lupa has stopped inhaling, you slide down the toot towards her gums. As you hit the ground, you gag. Lupa's breath is horrible. It smells like death. When was the last time she brushed. As you stand up, you step on what you think is a rock but quickly realize it can't be. You look down in horror to see a skeletal foot lodged between Lupa's teeth. "Hasn't that werewolf ever heard of dental floss?" Of course you realize that Lupa doesn't exactly need dental floss because as you turn your head you see a claw coming towards you and move to dodge the incoming claw. At least now you know how Lupa picks her teeth. As she does so, her gaping tongue licks at the tooth, dangerously close to you. If Lupa realizes you're in her mouth, you're doomed. How ironic. You're hiding from Lupa inside her own jaws.
131112.title: Huff and Puff

choices: Cadence comes and tells her to spit you out
1311121.content:
Slowly and almost tortuously, her massive pink landscape of a tongue moves over the fang directly onto you, swabbing you up in saliva and onto one of her tastebuds. Lupa paused. She felt a familiar, delicious taste wash over her tongue. Human. Such soft skin, such sweet meat. She grinned a wild and toothy grin as she played around with her tongue, sending you crash around into her mountain-sized tastebuds.

"Well well well, my little snack finally decided to accept it's role!"With you directly in her maw, her booming voice was intensified a hundred fold, nearly deafening you. But, you were utterly helpless now. You were going to be eaten, a small snack for the massive werewolf.
1311121.title: Lupa notices you

13111211.content: There's nothing you can do as Lupa continues to play with you on her tongue. She savors your delicious taste and this moment. You scream in terror as tongue suddenly tilts up and you start sliding towards Lupa's throat. Then she tilts her head back and swallows you. You slowly travel down the esophagus. You become drenched in even more saliva and some mucus as the muscles massage you down to Lupa's hungry stomach. Eventually, your journey comes to an end as land in the stomach with a plop. You look around in terror and disbelieve. Lupa did it. She finally ate you. You are now just a massive werewolf's breakfast. Soon the digestive jucies begin to flow. You scream and try to back away, but it's useless. It takes the digestive jucies about six seconds to break you down into a nutritous soup. Meanwhile, Lupa lets out a large burp and rubs her belly. "Mmmmm. My little snack was so delicious," she said. Then she went about living the rest of her life eating other humans, though none were ever as delicious as you were.
13111211.title: Lupa swallows

choices: Cadence heads back to your own apartment, maybe to share a snack?
She stays in this hallway for a while. Maybe she likes being this big?
13111212.content:
Just before you guessed you were about to be sucked down the gaping black hole that was Lupa's mouth, you heard sounds from coming out of her maw. Apparently, some other monster was talking to her. It was unintelligible, considering your ears were filled with the werewolf's spit, but once you cleaned them out, you still found that the words made no sense. They were almost simplistic grunts and moans, until you recognized that they were familiar grunts and moans, except a tad more booming and echo-y.

"Oh...hey Cadence."Lupa said casually to the blue-skinned zombie girl. Obviously the magic hall had magnified your undead caretaker to a titanic size as well.

Cadence replied in a series of annoyed groans. She had been looking for you.

"R.L.? Nope, can't say I've seen him."She lied right through her fangs. Cadence said more grunts, expect a bit more angry this time. Lupa and Cadence were always on neutral terms with one another. They both had known each other for a while, seeing as how they've shared an apartment building for a few years, and they've never had any reason to quarrel until you arrived.

"Whoah girl..."Lupa said, her voice carrying a worried tone."No need to say stuff like that."

More angry grunts and a little guttural roaring.

"Fine, fine!"Lupa complied, opening up her maw and reaching inside with her claws, plucking you out and dispensing you onto a vast blue wasteland that was Cadence's palm. You looked up at her partially rotted face, but still a tad feminine.

"Thanks Cadence!"You called up to her. She nodded at you. Lupa sulked away, angry her meal had gotten away. This was the closest you had ever been to getting eaten by her, but you were glad your giant zombie friend was around. She always had a sense of knowing when you were in trouble.
13111212.title: Cadence comes and tells her to spit you out

choices: Stay with Lupa for a while...
1311122.content:
Her massive tongue scans her mouth, and you hide behind one of Lupa's own tooth to avoid it. It presses on the tooth your leaning on, and you hold your breath as it continues on. You climb out from behind her teeth and stand on her gums. You watch as the mountainous, slick muscle returns to its original position. Suddenly, everything around you begins to shake, and you slip off her gums. You slide down the slick flesh at an incredible pace until you finally reach the bottom of her mouth. You land hard and roll into a pool of Lupa's hot saliva, which was actually the size of a pool to you, forcing you to swim in the thick fluid.
"Dammit...I shrunk him too small" Lupa's voice pierced the heavens so loud, you had to cover your ears. You feel the entire space around you shift as Lupa gets up. The pool your in turns into a river leading to an ocean as it follows towards Lupa's tongue.
"No, no, no, no, no, NO!" You scream as you fight the flow of her saliva. You swim as fast as you possibly can, but the fluid was far too thick and you are pulled with the current towards the pink mountain. You scream as you're forced under the tongue of your worst enemy, allowing even less light available for you to see. The current is throwing you in multiple directions at once to the point where you don't know which way is up.

This torture continues for what feels like hours with your body being pushed by wolf spit. You occasionally rubbed against her tongue, which felt hot, smooth, and amazingly soft. You gave up on resisting a while ago and are now allowing Lupa's mouth to have its way with you, which was alright because the fighting currents allowed your head to stay above the torrent, allowing you to take in the scent of Lupa. It was the smell of rotting meat and spit. Everything she says makes your ears ring due to the magnitude of her body and how close you were to her throat. But suddenly your surroundings started to shake again, and your lifted out of the ocean of slobber as Lupa coughs. It was a small one, but it was more than enough to release you from her saliva. You land on the bottom of her mouth, but this time in a dry area. You look back at the massive expanse of her maw, the saliva that you were just stuck in was quickly swallowed by Lupa, her tongue arching back and an incredibly loud GULP! could be heard. Talk about a close call... Her tongue returned to its original position, which stopped just inches before you. You crawl backwards, scared of the powerful muscle attacking you and watch it closely. It doesn't move for a few minutes, which allows you to relax. Suddenly it hits you, you are relaxing while in the mouth of a predator that would want nothing more than to eat you. The shear thought of it made you chuckle. Lupa hadn't moved much for a while, so this may be a good time to escape. You stand up on the fleshy floor and look up at the wall of her gums. You were but a mere speck to her, so it would be incredibly difficult to climb up that slick wall. On the other hand, you could stay in this monster's maw until the she falls asleep to crawl out. What to do?
1311122.title: She doesn't notice you

13111222.content:
You wait it out for a few more hours, before you hear the deafening sound of a snore above you. Of course she snores. Well, time to get the hell out of Dodge. You struggle up the slick wall that is Lupa's gumline, and reach the base of the ivory teeth. You enter one of the valleys and instantly have to cover your nose. Rotten pieces of food line the floor, creating an ungodly stench. Braving your way through the odorous gulch, you see your final obstacle: the lips. There is a "short" gap of a dozen feet between the teeth and the lips. If you don't make it, you'll have to climb an even slicker wall to get out. Now or never, you suppose. With a running jump, you leap onto the mountainous lips.

From here, the you climb down her chin to the city-sized pillow beneath you. Though you are climbing much further than the past few times combined, it's much easier with the hairs all around you. Finally, you touch down on Lupa's pillow, and just in time. An ear-piercing ringing blasts you, and a godlike arm reaches for the alarm clock. The maw behind you opens completely, and a gale of morning breath sends you flying in the air. You land...
13111222.title: Stay with Lupa for a while...

choices: She arrives at her apartment, still titanic, and readies to eat you
She makes you climb her first.
13112.content:
"Hmm....y'know what?"Lupa thundered from so high above, a slight playful tone to her voice."I think I like my food tenderized before I gobble it down..."

You had no idea what she meant by that, but you were terrified to find out. In only a matter of moments, you did. With a loud rumbling, her monumental paw in front of you began to rise high into the air until it casted a long shadow across for many miles(to you at least), blocking out the entire sky above with her landscape-like footpaw."Squishy-squishy..."She chuckled with her deep, bass-like voice. You knew that you couldn't run away. She was simply too big. So, as the massive paw large enough to devastate a city and it's surrounding countryside descended upon you, you stood there and waited until the last second before it made contact to shout "Crap!"

You were met with countless tons of pawpad flesh that ground you into the floor below, painful, but not enough to kill you. You figured that she was so big that a mere movement from her was powerful enough to turn you to paste, but it seemed Lupa was being extra gentle for some reason. She did want to save you later for a snack, but for now, she seemed content with mildly squishing you underneath her footpaw.

Then the situation worsened. The werewolf titaness began walking. With each colossal stride, you were slammed deeper into her sole, threatening to crush you from the sheer weight placed upon you.
13112.title: She lifts up her paw and brings it down on you.

choices: You start getting rid of the lice off of Lupa
13112..content:
Suddenly, Lupa comes to a halt just with you right near her feet, and she keeps her eye down on you wil a vicious glare, and then she has the thought of using you for one thing. Aside from eating you and try to squish you, maybe she wants you to do something for her, so she had this to say. "Say... since you are so cute and small, I want you to climb up on me and remove the lices that are giving me an inch." she asked you, you thought that this was stupid on all levels.

"What... lice? Why would you ask me to climb your furry ass to get lice off of you, ask someone else!" you yelled to her, before she stomps you down to stop you (not crushed) and you screamed. "You either do it, or death is yours!" Lupa demanded in anger as she snaps at you for trying to get out. "Fine!"

You begin to grab the fur of the titanic werewolf and you begin your ascend on Lupa to get her lices off her.

Where do we go from here?
13112..title: Climb me

choices: "...let's keep it interesting!" She goes through with her chase idea.
"...down the hatch!" She eats you right then and there.
131121.content:
After several more torturous steps, Lupa stops for a moment before she lifting her paw. With a surprising amount of control and accuracy, she removes you from her sole with her claws. Still holding you in between her claws she then proceeds to open the door to her apartment. As you enter the large space with the titaness you glance around. Naturally, everything in the room is bigger than you. The walls are a light shade of blue. There is a small kitchen area with a small stove, faucet, chairs, a dining table and a pretty big fridge. There was also a nice sized sofa in front of a TV and a small hallway that led to her bedroom. The most eye-catching thing was a desk. It was spawled numerous papers on it with various sketches and designs, pencils and pens. It stood out mainly because it was pretty messy whereas the rest of the apartment was tidy for the most part.

Lupa walks over to the table and places you on it. She leers down at you with a fanged smile.

"Finally, got you," she states needlessly.

You gulp. This was it.

"I could just eat you now," she muses out loud causing you to take a step back. Not that it would've help. The table was literally miles of flat surface that offered no hiding spaces.

"But that would be...boring," she continues. "I've eaten a LOT of humans, ya' know?" She pats her considerable belly for emphasis. "But I've never gotten a good chase or at least one that I thought was fun."

That's a sick definition for fun, you think terrified.

"Besides, while tasty, you little snacks aren't very filling."

You look up at her with some hope. Maybe you won't die just yet.

Somehow, despite being so much larger than you, Lupa notices your expression and her smile increases even more. "So here's what I was thinking: I go raid my fridge, curbing my hunger for a bit. Then I give you, let's say, 'til the count of thirty, to run around this room and try to hide from me and I try to catch you. You somehow stay away from me long enough, I won't eat you..." You smile at that but it drops when she keeps going. "...today. And we continue to do this until you bore me. That way, I still get something to eat and some entertainment, you get live a little while longer. However, if you fail, I get to eat you anyway to top off my meal." Lupa had to wipe some drool at that thought. "Ooorrr, I could just eat you now."

You just stand there, scared out of your mind. You hope she goes with her first idea, you might have a chance if she does that. Lupa just stares down at you hungrily, her claws resting on her belly, drumming on it. Several agonizing heartbeats later, Lupa's stomach gives a growl and gurgle that forces you to cover your ears.

"I've decided..." she starts with you hanging off every word.
131121.title: She's hungry but sporting...maybe

choices: You are actually able to hide or avoid Lupa for awhile before she catches you
1311211.content:
"...let's make this fun!" she exclaimed, giving you a fanged grin.

You give her a shaky, nervous smile in return. "I-I'll t-t-try...?"

Lupa gave a booming laugh, forcing you to cover your ears. "For your sake, you better."

The werewolf then reached over and took something from the sink. Your eyes widen when you see it is a 'small' glass cup. Lupa turns it upside down in her claws before placing it over you. Her intent was obvious: you weren't going anywhere. You panic for a second wondering if you'll suffocate when you run out of air. After several moments you calm down when you realize at your current size the glass is still several miles high. It would be a long time before you ran out of air.

With that worry over you look out from the clear glass to Lupa who is doing just as she said: gathering up food from her fridge. There are somethings you recognize but there are others that you wouldn't even begin guessing at. Either way, you just wait around as Lupa prepares her meal. As the titaness goes about her food, you start think of how this will play out? How in the heck can you get away from a miles tall werewolf that really wants to eat you? Even at her size, she can tell where you're are at and pick you up without even trying.

You spend what feels like an eternity racking your brain before a thunderous belch sends quakes through the glass and making you once again protect your ears. You look at Lupa who is picking her teeth with one of her claws and several empty plates beside her. She lets out a smaller burp before reaching over towards the glass and lifting it up and away.

"Well, it's time, R.L.," she states needlessly. You shiver at the excited glint in her eyes.

You gather whatever courage you can and nod.

"But before we do..." Lupa trailed off as she started and the rest of the room started to shrink. You look around wildly as everything become smaller and less daunting.

By the time it stops, Lupa has gone from being so huge that she towered miles above you to about 900 feet. She's still far larger than you're used to but at least it seems like you have a fighting chance. Without a word, she grabs you and places you on the floor.

You look up to her as she turns around, sending tremors through the floor.

"You've got 'til I count to 30 to run and hide somewhere," Lupa calls back to you.

Before she even gets to 1 you take off running. You don't know where, but anywhere is better than being in the open. Who knows you just might make it through this...
1311211.title: Lupa wants it fun

13113.content:
You struggle between the surfaces of her Lupa's paw digits as she lifts you towards her gaping maw. You can feel the warmth of her breath washing over you just when she pauses.

"I'm getting ahead of myself, I always said I'd savour you when I finally caught you didn't I?" She coyly teased. "Please wait! I'll do anything Lupa! Just don't eat me!!" you quickly shout back over the wails and groans of the gluttonous stomach below. "It's going to take a mighty sweet deal to stay out of here pip-squeak!" she beckons to her colossally rotund mid-section, "What can you possibly offer me?!" she responds mockingly.

"Anything! You name it! I just don't want to be eaten!" you pant back. "Don't give me that crap R.L, of course you do, why else would you move here never mind STAY here?! You WANT this!" she opens her mouth and points down her gullet. "That's insane, I don't want to die! I'll do anything to walk away from this!".

Lupa looks at you with a cold smile. "Okay, I'll play along" she smugly states, "If you want to live the rest of your life on the outside of my hungry gut, you have to spend it worshipping it. You need to bring other humans as a sacrifice every week to keep me nice and fed!" she declares intensely.

"What about the rest of the time!? Can I go about my business?" you reply desperately clinging to any plan possible. "No, you have to go everywhere with me! I need you to lure the snacks in for me" she laughs. "Where will I sleep?" you ask now calming down a bit, there might be a way out of the woods here. "You'll have to sleep in my belly button! I'll put tape or something over it so you can't escape, so don't even think about trying to run or I'll just gobble you up and you'll be nothing but grub!". Well so much for a way out.

There's no other way you think. You're going to have to pledge your life to this beast or die inside her. On one hand it might be quick to die in her stomach and on the other, a lifetime of unhappiness. How can someone make a decision like this?

"Hey! Do you want this deal or not? Because I'm too hungry to wait while you waste MY snack time!".
13113.title: The Devil's Terms and Conditions.

choices: Ghost Girl(Corlette, very shy and nervous)
Chimera Woman(Bianca, incredibly bipolar due to her three heads.)
1312.content:
Without really thinking, you duck underneath one of the nearby doors, the gap between the bottom of the door and the floor easily large enough for you to fit yourself through. This building was made for giant monsters hundreds of feet tall, you felt like a mouse or even a small bug as you do this. Within your new surroundings, the room was incredibly dark, so you couldn't really make out what was inside. But you did hear breathing coming from somewhere. You forgot that it was still early in the morning and that most other residents were probably still asleep. Lupa just had to be exception.

Speaking of Lupa, she stopped right in front of the locked door that separated her and you. You peered underneath the door, drips of her saliva falling to the ground in front of you and splashing across the floorboards."You win this time, R.L....."She whispered, crouching low so that her angry eye stared directly at you. You took a few steps away from the door just as a precaution."You're lucky I don't wanna bother who's in here. But I'll get ya next time, promise..."She chuckled, even though it sounded more like snarling, stood back up, and walked away, her booming footsteps becoming less and less noticeable by the second. You didn't even hear her at all after a minute. With a heavy sigh of relief you wiped the sweat from your brow and took stock of the situation. You had escaped Lupa, but now you were in an unknown monster's living area, and you had no idea how they'd react to a small human suddenly appearing in their home. You would head right back out the door, but the risk of running into Lupa again would be too great. You decided that you were just going to take a breather here and head out in about a few minutes.

"Man...glad that's over..."You said aloud, only for the click of a lamp and footsteps from deeper within the apartment to be heard."Who said that?"You heard a female voice say.

"....Crap..."You mutter as you stand back up, only for an approaching form a giantess come closer and closer. You looked up to see that the monster who lived here was a...
1312.title: Unknown Apartment

choices: How would you like to stand up to that werewolf for what she did to you?
13121.content:
You look up and you see the monster who lived in this apartment wasn't even alive, she was a ghost floating directly above you. Her skin was pure white and she had bright glowing pink eyes with long black hair with silver streaks fashioned into a pair of giant pig tails as if she was a baby doll. You let out a scream and the ghost girl shares a scream as she flies upwards. "Wh-Who are you and wh-what are you doing in my apartment? Pl-Please don't hurt me." You were surprised, this girl was a ghost, you couldn't hurt her.

"I'm not going to hurt you. I mean, you're a ghost, how worse off can you get. My name is R.L. and I only came in here to hide. What's your name?" The ghost girl hesitates and flies downwards still wary of you. "Well? What's your name." "C-Corlette. Please, leave me alone." "I'm sorry, I didn't mean to upset you. I wouldn't be in here if it weren't for Lupa."

Suddenly Corlette lets out a scream and turns invisible. "Was it something I said?" "L-Lupa ch-chased you in here." "Yeah, but she said she didn't want to bother you." Corlette turns visible again and then begins to cry uncontrollably, forcing you to run, her tears like huge meteors to you. "Ah! Hey! Be careful! Corlette then lets out a sniff. "The only reason Lupa doesn't want to bother me is because she can't do anything worse to me than she already did."

You walk closer out of curiosity. This ghost didn't like Lupa any more than you did. "What did Lupa do to you?" Corlette cries even wilder than ever. "Why do you think I'm a ghost?! I came to this horrible Horrorville to visit Cadence! I was so crushed when she died that I had to see her when I learned she was a zombie! I had no idea monsters were so big! The first monster I met when I came to this apartment was Lupa, she told me she was Cadence's friend and offered me a lift to Cadence's apartment! I was so stupid! That rotten werewolf took me to her apartment, bit my arms and legs off, used my body as salad dressing and put my head on top of a sundae like a cherry!!" "Ouch." You think to yourself as Corlette continues crying.

"And that's not the worst of it! Everytime she sees me, she reminds me of how delicious I was! She loves to rub salt in the wounds!" Corlette keeps crying and you try to tap on her hand to calm her down, forgetting about her intangibility. "It's alright Corlette. I'm so sorry." Corlette lets out a sniffle and begins to calm down. And then you decide to ask her a question.
13121.title: Corlette

choices: Beat Lupa up and show her who's in charge now.
Possess Lupa and use her as a new body.
131212.content:
"Hey Corlette, how would you like to stand up to that werewolf for what she did to you?" You asked, a smile forming on your face.

"W-what do you mean?" The ghost girl asked nervously.

"I mean you're a ghost now, so why don't you use that to your advantage? Think about it. Lupa can't possibly hurt you anymore, but you can do anything you want to her. I think that you should get some well deserved payback on her."

You could see Corlette's eyes light up as she heard what you said.

"I... I never even thought about that... All this time, I've been terrified of Lupa. I always hid from her in fear because of what she did to me. But R.L., you're right! She can't even touch me now! I can finally get even with her for what she did to me!" Corlette said, a newfound confidence in her voice.

"That's right Corlette, and she deserves to be punished for what she's done. Not only what she did to you, but for trying to do the same to me, and who knows how many other humans before us! She always treated us as nothing more than a snack food, but eating you turned you into something more powerful than her. She made you into a ghost, and now she can't do anything to stop you from getting even with her. She dug her own grave, so now she has to lie in it."

"Yeah! It's time to teach that heartless mutt a lesson! When I'm through with her, she'll never want to eat another human ever again! Thanks R.L., thank you so much. If you hadn't shown up and talked some sense into me, I'd still be living in fear of someone who can't even hurt me. Now let's go, little buddy, we've got a naughty little puppy who needs to be punished."

Corlette then turned her body tangible and reached down to pick you up. Smiling at your new friend, you stepped onto her pale palm and let her lift you into the air. Corlette then smiled at you and pressed the index finger of her free hand against your forehead. Winking at you cutely, she used her powers to turn your body intangible, also giving you the ability to fly just like her. The ghost girl then turned herself intangible again and proceeded to float toward the door. You followed her eagerly, and the two of you flew straight through the door without even opening it. You were really enjoying this sensation. Being able to fly freely through the air, uninhibited by the walls around you. It was absolutely amazing. If this was what it was like to be a ghost, then maybe you really should have just let Lupa eat you long ago.

With a newfound confidence, Corlette eagerly flew toward the room of her target. With you floating by her side, the two of you entered Lupa's room to get payback. Lupa was simply lounging on her couch and watching TV, completely oblivious to the specter that had just entered her room. With a light giggle, Corlette flew over behind Lupa and began to think of what the best way to get revenge would be. After a bit of thought, Corlette decides to...
131212.title: Corlette's revenge

choices: Go Bother the Neighbors and get a Mob on her
1312122.content:
Corlette thinks hard and then rubs her hands as a fiendish look appears in her eyes. She knew exactly how to get revenge on Lupa for brutally devouring her. "Oh what the heck," she says to herself. "It wouldn't be the first time I was inside of her. 1, 2, 3." Corlette dives at Lupa and Lupa lets out a howling scream as she's pushed out of her seat. Before the wolf knows what hit her, Corlette fully enters her body and Lupa's brown wolf like eyes turn into Corlette's glowing pink eyes. As Lupa gets up, you let out a cautious look but then she smiles at you and laughs in Corlette's voice.

"Holy cow!" you yell as you fly down at Corlette. "You possessed her. "Hey," said Corlette. "She owes me a body. Ugh." Corlette feels her hands around Lupa's fat stomach and thighs. "And definitely needs to go on a diet." "Oh," you say. "This is too perfect. Too, too, perfect. Now Lupa is in our power. Now how should we exploit this?" "Oh!" yells Corlette as she sits down on the couch and eats some of Lupa's candy from the table. "I have an idea. We'll sheer all her fur off. The vain little wolf girl will die of embarrassment when she goes to work looking like a naked mole rat."

You both laugh at that thought. Lupa took great pride in appearance despite here weight, especially when it came to her fur. But then you had an idea of your own. "Hold on. What if Lupa annoyed all the neighbors, mad them real mad..." "Oh!" yelled Corlette. "Good idea R.L. They'd tar and feather her." You both share another laugh as Corlette grabs you by the hands and twirls you around. Now that she could control Lupa's body, she could do anything she wanted with her. Both of you had good ideas on how to torture that werewolf for her carnivorous streak, but how will you punish her?
1312122.title: Possession

13121222.content:
"I think your idea sounds the best," said Corlette. "Imagine Lupa having an angry mob on her and this time it will be monsters like her." Corlette lets out a high pitched laugh as you float in the air. "Hold on Corlette. Let's not be too hasty. Why don't we only mess with the tenants who have it coming, Lupa is hardly the only unfriendly monster in the apartment." "Okay little guy. Time to get Lupa into some high trouble."

And so, Corlette in Lupa's body goes off to annoy the neighbors as you follow her. First Corlette decided to bother a monster who was already on bad terms with Lupa. It was Patsy, the biker cat sith girl. Corlette decides to paint Patsy's bike with pink flowers and teddy bears. Needless to say Patsy is not amused with "Lupa's" actions and lets out a hiss when she sees the damage.

Next Corlette decides to get Lupa in trouble with Bernice, that cantankerous ifrit on the top floor. Corlette knew that Bernice had been up all night working on a seafood chowder for the restaurant she worked at, and she got a nasty surprise when she saw Corlette had put Lupa's hair in the pot. She got so mad she burned down the wallpaper in her apartment.

Then Corlette wanted to have some mean fun with Shelly, that con artist kappa. As Shelly was trying to dismantle the washing machine to steal money. Shelly felt something wet on her head that wasn't the water in her dome and then she turned to see Corlette in Lupa's body drinking the water out as the kappa looked in horror. "Hehehe, sorry about that, Layla..."

"Thanks, Layla. You really are nice. I'm glad that I got to meet someone like you here. Not many of the monsters I've met so far have been particularly fond of having a human around."

You groan as Nefernina proceeds to scrape your flat undead body off of her mummified sole.

133.content:
You exhaled a sigh of relief upon seeing Izzy the Basilisk smiling down at you. That just goes to show how weird your life had become, the sight of a giant anthropomorphic snake woman calms you down now. Though to be fair Izzy was nowhere near as threatening as her species implied.

Izzy gave you that same flirtatious smile she saved just for you as she kneeled down to talk. "Well good morning, handsome. Out for a jog?"

You returned a friendly smile. "Yeah, figured if I'm here for a while may as well stay in running shape. If you know what I mean."

She chuckled a little at your joke. Though you were currently not interested in Izzy the same way she was with you, it was nice to spend time with her every now and then. What was not to like? She was smart, witty, and most of all kind. In a world like this, its nice to have a few friends you could count on.

"So, what are you up to, Izzy?"

"Well, I was on my way to the attic to pull out the Christmas decorations. Its getting close to that time of year I thought we'd get an early start." She lowered her hand down to you. "Want to help out R.L.?"

You've never been to the attic before. Something Nefernina said about humans in unwanted places. But that only made you curious and hey any chance to disobey the old mummy and not get caught was fine by you. "Sure, lets go."

You jumped on Izzy's hand and she lifted you up to about eye level before placing you on her shoulder with a smile. And the 2 of you were off. But in the world of monsters, danger waits around every corner...

1331.content:
With a great deal of luck it seemed, you and Izzy made it to the attic without so much as a shadow of Nefernina or Lupa. This brought a smile to your face, for once you could enjoy a morning of ordinary activity. Well ordinary for you anyway.

Izzy opened the door with you still on her shoulder. It was a very simple scene, a dark room with boxes and other things covered in dust and sheets, much like you would see in any other attic only bigger. Izzy picked you up from her shoulder and placed you on the ground.

"Ok," she said while looking down at you, "I just need a few minutes to grab everything we need for the decorations. You can look around if you want but don't go too far and watch out for bugs."

You give her the thumbs up and she smiles before walking over to the closest of the box piles to begin her search. You looked around curiously. Everything seemed simple enough, certainly nothing that should have caused that mummy witch to ban you from this room. So, why did she?

The search for whatever secrets that were hidden lead you to a small corner next to the attic window. Nothing seemed out of place, just the same giant sized boxes and chests that you could never open on your own and Izzy would never touch for fear of Nefernina's wrath. You could still hear the Serpent Queen talk softly under her breath as she continued her own search. But just as you were about to give up and walk back to Izzy, you saw it.

Tucked just behind one of the giant chests was a smaller chest, much smaller. It was human sized in fact. That got your attention. Why would Nefernina have a human chest let alone hide it? Checking to make sure Izzy was still busy with her project (she was currently trying to untangle a set of tree lights) you quickly darted over to the chest. Luck was on your side, it had no locks or chains to keep it shut. "Poor mummy," you thought wickedly, "can't keep me out of everything."

As quiet as you could you opened the chest. What do you find?
